headline: ZCTU Yozeya Mhinduro dzeVashandirwi Vari Kutsigira Kumakidzwa kweVashandi Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano reZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo ,vanoti ivo nemagweta avo vatanga kuzeya mhinduro dzemapazi nemakambani ehurumende apindura panyaya yavakakwidza kumatare yekuti vashandi vasamanikidzwa kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 sezvo kuita izvi kuchityora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. No media source currently available Vakaendeswa kumatare ava vanonzi vakati vashandi vasina kubayiwea nhomba vamire kuuuya kubasa. Vakaendeswa kumatare vanosanganisira gurukota rezvevashandi, VaPaul Mavima; gweta guru rehurumende, VaPrince Machaya; makambani anoti ZIMNAT Insurance, Zimbabwe National Road Administration (ZINARA), TelOne, Windmill, SEEDCO Zimbabwe nechikoro cheManicaland State University. Mukupindura zvakaturwa neZCTU kumatare, VaMachaya vati havazivi kuti sei ivo negurukota rezvevashandi vakapinzwa munyaya iyi nekuti handivo vanoudza vashandi kana makambani zvekuita panyaya dzakadai. VaMavima vaudza Studio7 kuti vakamboyedza kuti vataurirane neZCTU asi zvakaramba asi vachiti zvakakosha kuti vashandi vabayiwe nhomba. No media source currently available Kambani yeTelOne inoti nyaya iyi haifanire kunzwikwa nechimbi chimbi ichiti ZCTU yakatora mavhiki matatu kuiendesa kumatare zvinoratidza kuti hayaifunga kuti yakakosha zvekunzwikwa nechimbi chimbi.

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri muSouth Africa Zvotaura nezveCoronavirus
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa nemusi weSvondo vakatora matanho akaomarara mukuyedza kurwisa pamwe nekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus chatekeshera pasi rose Vanhu makumi matanhatu nevana vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika iyi. VaRamaphosa vakazivisa kuti South Africa kutanga nemusi weChitatu inenge yave kuvhara mimwe miganhu yayo uyo kurambidza kushanyira kana kutambira vanhu vari kubva kunyika dzabatwa nechirwere ichi dzinosanganisira Italy, Iran, South Korea, Iran, Spain, Germany, US, Britain ne China. Zvikoro zviri kuvharwawo musi uyu uye vanhu vari kurambidzwa kuungana kusanganisirawo kumiswa kwemitambo. MuSouth Africa mune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri kubatwa mumambure ezviri kuitwa kudzivirira chirwere ichi. VaOffice Jaka, avo vanobva kuKwekwe, vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti South Africa ichakwanisa kupedza dambudziko iri kunyange hazvo riri basa guru. Asi va Jaka vanoti varikunyanyo shungurudzika zvikuru, nevana vavo vaviri varikuita zvidzidzo zveElectrical Engineering kuChina. VaEmmanuel Mboti vanotiwo kunyangwe hazvo zvaitwa naVaRamaphosa zvakanaka, vichakanganisa hupfumi hwenyika yavo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kumiswa kwemitambo kuchakanganisa kurarama kwevakawanda. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chechidiki, chinogara muSouth Africa, VaMunyaradzi Mukanyiwa, vanoti vanowirirana nemashoko ataurwa naVaMbote. No media source currently available

headline: Chinhoyi University of Technology Inonzi Yave Kumanikidza Vadzidzisi, Vadzidzi neVashandi Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Chikoro chikuru cheChinhoyi University of Technology -CUT- chiri kurambidza vadzidzi nevashandi vanenge vasina kubayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19 kupinda pachikoro. Vadzidzi avo vanga vauya kuzopedza zvidzidzo zvavo pamwe nekunyora bvunzo nemusi weMuvhuro vakashamisika vachinzi vaburitse kadhi rinoratidza kuti vakabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19 kuti vabvumirwe kupinda pachikoro. Mumwe mudzidzi asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti arambidzwa kupinda pachikoro achinzi haana kubayiwa nhomba audza Studio 7 kuti anoti chanyanya kumurwadza ndechekuti havana kunge vayambirwa nezvedanho iri. Munyori anoona nezvemagariro evadzidzi musangano rinomirira vadzidzi pachikoro ichi VaFrancis Nhete vanoti danho ratorwa nechikoro rakanaka sezvo vachiwirirana naro sevatungamiri vevadzidzi. Mutauriri weCUT Dr Tapera Musekiwa vanoti vatora danho iri senzira yekudzivirira vamwe vadzidzi nevashandi. VaTapera vanoti vabva vaisa nhomba pakiriniki yechikoro kuti zvive nyore kune vanenge vasarudza kubayiwa.Zvikoro zvakawanda zvepamusoro zvakatozivisa kuti vadzidzi vanenge vasina kubayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19 havabvumirwe kudzidza kana kunyora bvunzo nevamwe. Asi danho iri riri kupikisawa nesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rinoti kuita izvi kutyora kodzero dzevanhu dziri mubumbiro remitemo. Gore rapera muna Mbudzi, chikoro cheCUT chakambovharwa mushure mekunge vadzidzi makumi mashanu nevanomwe vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa eZRP Anoparura Chirongwa cheKudzivirira Kuraraira kweHIV/Aids
text: Zimbabwe Republic Police neChitatu yakaparura hurongwa hwehwaro hwekuyedza kudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere cheHIV/AIDS kwamutare. Hwaro uhu hwakananganga nekubatsira mapurisa ari pabasa uye vari pamudyandigere. Hurongwa uhu hwave nenguva yakareba huchikwenenzverwa paine chinangwa chekuti panosvika gore ra2020 pange pasisina vanoshaya nekuda kwechirongwa ichi. Vanenge vaine chirwere ichi vanenge vachitarisirwa kuwana mapiritsi zviri nyore. Mukuru wemapurisa mudunhu reManicaland, Assistant Commissioner Dorothy Kupara, avo vakaparura chirongwa ichi, vanoti zvakakosha kuti mapurisa ose aremekedze hwaro hwavapo kuitira kuderedza kuparira kwechirwere ichi. Amai Kupara vanoti hapana chinonyadzisa pakunoongororwa chirwere cheHIV uye pamwechete nekutora mishonga yacho sezvinodiwa. “Chirwere ichi chakangofananawo neshuga, kana zvakubata gadziriswa, so my officer will ensure kuti zvashandiswa sezvinotarisirwa, uye my officer handifungi kuti pane vachange vachiramba kuzotestwa, uye basa richatowanda kune ma medical officers vachitesitwa.” Mukuru wemapurisa uyu anotiwo hwaro huripo uhu hunobudisa pachena kuti vanenge vaine chirwere havaizotadziswa kusimudzirwa pabasa. Hwaro uhu hunotiwo vanenge varwara vanokwanisa kumbonozorora zvavo vachipora vachizongodzokera pabasa kana vave kunzwa zviri nani. Mumashoko avo ekuvhara chiitiko ichi, mumwe mukuru wemapurisa Superintendant Kamanda vanoti hwaro hwavapo uhu huchabatsira mukufambisa basa ravo zvakanaka kunyanya kuvatungamiriri vemakamba kumatunhu ose emunyika. “Ndinoti kumaDispols (District Police Officers) ose kana masangana nechinhu chiri medical chingakunetsai munongoti ko policy inoti chii? Endai munotitoreraiwo ende rinonzi rakatsetseka rinosuppotwa nePolice Act uye ne the current Labour Laws, tinoiti chii zviya, iSimbi yebasa!” Mumwe wechipurisa anorarama nehurwere Sergeant Tawanda Mugeri vachipa huchapupu vanoti zvakakosha kuti munhu wega wega, kunyanya kuchipurisa, ararame achiziva paamire mushure mekuvhenekwa ropa. “Panhau yekuudza vamwe vekubasa, inonzi chii zviya, inonzi disclosure, zviri nani inini ndavakuziva zvandiri zvitori right, ndikaenda kuhospital vave kutondishevedza nefirst name nekuti ndikanzwa parwadza ndotomhanya kuti ndizive kuti chii.” Hwaro hwekubudisa HIV/AIDS Policy hwakaitwa pachidyidzanwa nemasangano akasiyana-siyana anosanganisira reNational Aids Council, NAC, Population Services International, PSI nemamwewo. Mukuru weNational Aids Council muManicaland, VaEvans Makoni, vanoti vari kushanda nemapurisa kuti vazadzikise zviri muhwaro mavo. “Chatiunganidza pano inyaya yeZRP AIDS Policy launch iyi, chirongwa chiripo pakuti National Aids Council yakapuhwa mutoro wekuti irwisane nedenda reHIV. Saka mukuita izvozvo tinoti vanhu vari pamabasa kuti vawanirwe nguva yekuitirwa ma programmes inoita shoma saka kambani ikaita policy yaino implemenda zvinobata vazhinji vanenge vari kumabasa toderedza huwandu hwemari yatinoshandisa pakurapa nekuti vanhu vanenge vadzivirira.” Vakuru vechipurisa havana kuda kuburitsa pachena kuti chirwere ichi chakapararira zvakanyanya seyi muZRP, kunyangwe hazvo ongororo ichitaridza kuti kuchipurisa kumwe kwemamwe mapoka emabasa kwakatekeshera chirwere ichi kusanganisira kuchiuto, nekuvatyairi vedzimotokari dzinofamba mitunhu mirefu. Hwaro hwakaparurwa uhwu hucharamba huchiongororwa nekugadzirisa kuti hukwanise kufambidzana neshanduko inenge iriko uye nenguva. No media source currently available

headline: Dr Mahomva Vokurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba yeCovid-19 Apo Vakawanda Vobatwa neChirwere Ichi Zvakare
text: Mukuru anoona nezvekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vari kukurudzira vanhu munyika kuti vabayiwe nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire zvakanyanya munyika. Dr Mahomva vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti ongororo dzose dziri kuitwa munyika nekunze dziri kuratidza kuti vakabayiwa nhomba vane mukana wakakura wekurarama kunyangwe vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Bazi rezvehutano rakatozivisa kuti mhando yeCovid-19 inopararira zvakanyanya yeomicron yave kutotenderera munyika. Nemusi weSvondo, bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemumwe kana kuti 4, 701. Vanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevatatu kana kuti 523 vabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zana rezviuru nemakumi matatu nepfumbamwe zvine makumi mana nematanhatu kana kuti 139, 046. Vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nemana zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana kana kuti 3 874 694 vakabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga. Vanhu vabayiwa kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi masere nemana zvine makumi mana nemashanu kana kuti 2 884 045. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba mukupefra kwemwedzi uno kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana.

headline: Vanachiremba Vakuru Vanozivisa Kuramwa Mabasa Kana Zvichemo Zvavo Zvisina Kugadziriswa
text: Vanachiremba vakuru vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association, neChitatu vakapa hurumende mazuva gumi nemana ekuti igadzirise matambudziko ari muzvipatara pamwe nenyaya yemihoro yavo, kukundikana kwayo voramwa mabasa. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa zuva rimwero kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere che Covid-19 munyika hwakakwira kusvika pachiuru nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 1 089, zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana matanhatu negumi nevaviri kana kuti 2 612 vakavhenekwa. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi kusvika nezuro vaive mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kana kuti 395, uye vashaya vachiri makumi maviri. Tsamba yakanyorwa nesangano ravanachiremba vakuru iyi, iyo yakanyorerwa kuboka reHealth Services Board, kumunyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano pamwe nekuvakuru vezvipatara, kana kuti hospital clinical directors, iri kuda kuti hurumende iise mishonga nezvikwanisiro muzvipatara, iwanise vanachiremba zvekuzvidzivirira kubva ku Covid-19, uye kuti mihoro yavo ive iri mumadhora ekuAmerica ichienzaniswa nemari dzavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018. Vanachiremba ava vari kudawo kuti zvichemo zvevamwe vashandi vemuboka rezvehutano vari pakuramwa mabasa pari zvino zvigadziriswe kuitira kuti vabatsirane mabasa, uyewo kuti nhengo dzavo dzinoshanda kuUniversity of Zimbabwe asi iye zvino dziri kushanda muzvipatara munguva ino, dzinge dzichibhadharwa mari dzekushanda uku. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Pasi rose vanhu vabatwa ne Covid-19 vadarika mamiriyoni gumi nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 15.5 million, uye vanhu vafa vadarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi masere nezvina kana kuti 584 000. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano vachidzidzisa zvehutano pa Nottingham Trent University, ku Britain, Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, vanoti vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti igare pasi navanachiremba ava vakurukure zvichemo zvavo kuti zvinhu zvisaipa kudarika zvazviri pari nhasi muzvipatara. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti chinonyanyorwadza ndechekuti vanachiremba ava vari kuda kuramwa mabasa munguva iyo nyika iri mudambudziko re Covids-19, izvo zvinozoisa varwere vagara vaine zvimwe zvirwere zvinovanetsa munyodzi huru kana vakazobatwa neCovid-19. Vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvinhu muzvipatara nekukasika, umo munonzi hamuna mishonga nezvimwe zvikwanisiro. Doctor Nyashanu vanotiwo kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubata chirwere cheCovid-19 chinhu chinityisa nekuti kana vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vanenge vachida kubatwa zvakanaka, uye kuti vabatwe zvakanaka vanofanirwa kunge vachienda kuzvipatara, uko kunofanirwa kunge kuine vanamukoti navanachiremba. headline: Zvikoro Zvogadzira Zvikwanisiro Zvekushandisa Kurwisa Kupararira kweCovid-19
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus hwakaburitswa nehurumende neMuvhuro, hwasvika pavanhu vasere, uye munhu ashaya nechirwere ichi achiri munhu mumwe chete. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira chero nguva apo hurumende ichazivisa zvinenge zvaitika. Pavanhu vasere vakabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus, vana vanobva kudunhu reMashonaland East, vatatu kuHarare uye mumwe chete kuVictoria Falls. Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West, Dr Wensilus Nyamayaro, vanoti zvave kuziviswa manheru ega ega kana pane zvinenge zvashanduka pahuwandu hwevanhu vanenge vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus. Zimbabwe yakatara mazuva makumi maviri nerimwe ekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi, icho chabata vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi mana muZimbabwe, uye vanhu vanosvika mazana masere ezviuru pasi rose. Senzira yekubatsira varwere munyika iyo yakatarisana nekushaikwa kwema ventilators anobatsira kufema vanenge varwarisa zvakanyanya nechirwere ichi, zvimwe zvikoro zvepamusoro zvinoti zviri kushandisa hunyanzvi hwazvo kugadzira ma ventilators, ma sanitisers nemasiki. Chikono chepamusoro cheHarare Institute of Technology chinoti chiri pakati pekugadzira muchina wekufambisa mhepo mudzimba dzinochengeterwa vanhu vanenge vachirwara nechirwere cheCOVID-19. Ukuwo Chinhoyi University of Technology, CUT, inotiwo iri pakati pekugadzira mamasiki apo kune rumwe rutivi iri kutsvaka zvikwanisiro zvekugadzira ma sanitisers sezvo chikoro ichi chine hunyanzvi hwacho. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muChinhoyi, mutauriri weCUT, VaMusekiwa Tapera, vati vari kugadzira mamasiki senzira yakaonekwa nechikoro ichi yekurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus. VaTapera vati vamwe vana muzvinafundo vari mubishi kuita hurongwa hwekugadzira ma sanitisers. Asi mukuru weCUT, Muzvinafundo Jambwa Simbi, vati basa rekugadzira mamasiki riri kudzoserwa kumashure nekushaikwa kwemagetsi nguva dzakawanda. Zvikoro izvi zviri kutora matanho aya sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika munyaya dzehutano panguva iyo hurumende iri kutatarika kuwanira vashandi vemuzvipatara zvipfeko zvekuzvidzivirira zvakakwana pavanenge vachirapa varwere vanofungidzirwa kuti vane Coronavirus. Zimbabwe yapinda muzuva repiri vanhu vachigara kudzimba dzavo senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus, iyo yakatanga kuChina gore rapera, uye kusvika pari zvino, yauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi matatu nezvisere pasi rose, kusanganisira Zororo Makamba wemuZimbabwe, uyo akashaya svondo rapera. headline: MDC Alliance Yokumbira Musangano neZEC
text: Mubatanidzwa unopikisa weMDC Alliance wanyora tsamba kuZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC uchikumbira kuita musangano nekomisheni iyi kuti vazeye nyaya dziri kunetsa dzakanangana nesarudzo, idzo dzasarirwa nemazuva makumi maviri nemashanu chete. Mutsamba yanyorwa naVaJameson Timba, avo vari kumiririra vari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika vakamirira MDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa kuZEC, mubatanidzwa uyu unoti uri kuda kuona gwaro richashandiswa pakuvhota uye kuti richachengetedzwa kupi. Mumashoko avo, VaTimba vanotiwo vanodawo gwaro revavhoti rine mifananidzo re Biometric Voter Registration. Sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba vanoti vakagadzirira kuita musangano nemapato ose ari kukwikwidza musarudzo kuti vazeye zvichemo zvavo. VaChamisa vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter vanoti vanyorerarawo kuvatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC neAfrican Union nezvemamiriro akaita zvinhu muZimbabwe. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaMaxwell Saungweme vanoti zvichemo zvine mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance zvakakosha asi hapachina nguva yekuti zvigadziriswe sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. headline: VaMushowe Vanokundikana Zvakare Kumira Pamberi peKomiti yeParamende
text: Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaChristopher Mushowe, neChina vatadza zvekare kuuya kukomiti yeparamende kuti vazotaura matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende mukugadzirisa mitemo inombunyikidza vatori venhau pamwe nekusunungura masai sai ematerevhizheni. Nhengo dzeparamende kubva kubato rinopikisa pamwe nemasangano anomirira vatori venhau varatidza kutsamwa kukuru nenamaitiro aVaMushowe avo vakatadza kuuya kudare iri svondo rapera mushure mekunge vakokwa nekomiti yeparamende. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, uye vachimirira Mabvuku, VaJames Maridadi veMDC-T, vati kuita kwaVaMushowe kuri kudzorera shure nyaya dzekugadzirisa mitemo inombunyikidza vatapi venhau. Mukuru wesangano rinomiriria nhepfenyuro dzemumatunhu, reZimbabwe Association of Community Radio Stations, Muzvare Vivian Marara, vatiwo zvinoratidza kuti VaMushowe havana chido chekusandura mutemo yekutapwa kwenhau munyika. Muzvare Kholiwe Majama Nyoni veMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe vashorawo kuita kwaVaMushowe. Vatiwo komiti yeparamende iyi haifaniri kurega VaMushowe vachiita madiro aJojina uye inofanira kutora matanho akaoma kuti VaMushowe vauye kudare iri. Vanoona nzvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano Media Alliance of Zimbabwe, VaNigel Nyamutumbu, vati kunyange hazvo vasiri kufara nemaitiro aVaMushowe, vanoonawo sekuti komiti yeparamende iyi haisi kuita basa rayo nemazvo. Pavabvunzwa kuti vachaita sei naVaMushowe, sachigaro wekomiti iyi, VaWilliam Dhewa, vati VaMushowe vabatikana uye vanofanira kupihwa nguva. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMushowe kuti tinzwe kuti sei vari kutadza kuuya kuparamende. Kunyange hazvo mamwe mapazi ehurumende ari kuunza mabhiri kuparamande kuti mitemo iri pasi pawo isaundurwe kuti ifambirane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika, bazi raVaMushowe harina kana bhiri rarakaunza kudare kubva muna 2013 pakagadzwa bumbiro idzva. VaMushowe vange vachitarisirwa kuti taura kuti mitemo yakaita seAccess to Information and Protection of Privacy Act, Broadcasting Services Act nemimwe ichasandurwa riini. VaMushowe vange vachitarisirwawo kutsanangura kuti sei marezenezi eCapitalk neNyaminyami ayo akapihwa kukambani yeKingstons ave kushandiswa nekambani yeZimpapers. Masangano anomiriria vatori venhau azivisa kuti achaita musangano wechimbi chimbi kuti aronge kuti angaite sei naVaMushowe. Zvichakadai, komiti iyi svondo rinouya ichashanyira nhepfenyuro dzose ichiona kuti dziri kushanda sei. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaMwonzora, Votarisirwa Kuita Musangano kuZimbabwe Grounds neVatsigiri Vavo neSvondo
text: Mutungamiri wechimwe chikwata che MDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vari kutarisirwa neSvondo kuita musangano mukuru munhandare yeZimbabwe Grounds mumusha weHighfields wekutsvagira nhengo dzavo rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzema by-election dziri kuitwa mwedzi uno. Mutauriri waVaMwonzora, VaLloyd Damba, vanoti vanotarisira kuti vatsigiri vavo vachabuda nehuwandu hwavo kuenda kumusangano uyu, vachiti havatarisire kuti vangarambidzwa nemapurisa kuunga sezvakamboitika kuEpworth. Panyaya yekuti vanotarisira vanhu vakawanda here misangano yanga ichimboitwa naVaMwonzora yaipindwa nevanhu vashomashoma, vadamba vanoti vanhu havafanirwi kufananidza misangano yaiitirwa mudzimba nemuzvikoro nemusangano mukuru we rally, sezvo zvakatosiyana zvachose. headline: America Inobudisa Gwaro Rinoshora Kutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu muZimbabwe
text: Bazi re America rionoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, re State Department, rabudisa gwaro pamusoro pekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kwarinoti kuri kuitwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Gwaro iri, kana kuti Zimbabwe 2020 Human Rights Report, rine mapeji makumi mana nemapfumbamwe (49), uye rinobva muongororo yakaitwa muna 2020. Bazi re State Department rinoti hurumende mu Zimbabwe inouraya vanhu pamusoro pezvamatongerwo enyika, inotsakatikisa vanhu, kutocha vanhu nekusabata vasungwa zvakanaka. Gwaro iri rinoshoravo majeri emunyika, pamwe chete nekushora mabatirwo anoitwa ngochani mu Zimbabwe. Tatadza kubata vanoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, uye vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, vati hurumende ye Zimbabwe haifanirwi kumirira kunzwa zvinobva kunze kwenyika, vachiti kana hurumende ikaterera pose panochema vana ve Zimbabwe, haizotyori kodzero dzavo nekuti inenge yave kuziva zvisingadiwi nevanhu. headline: Nhengo dzeParamende Dzinotora Mhiko Dzichivimbisa Kushandira Zvido zveVanhu
text: Nhengo dzeparamende dzakakunda musarudzo dzegore rino nhasi dzatora mhiko yekutanga basa dzichivimbisa kuti dzichadzika mitemo inosimudzira magariro everuzhinji munyika pamwe nekuvandudza mitemo yese kuitira kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Nhengo zhinji dzeparamende dzaudza Studio7 kuti dzinofara chose nekusarudzwa kupinda mudare reparamende uye dzavimbisa kuti dzichaita zvese zvadzaivimbisa vanhu. Mumiri weMazowe South muNational Assembly, VaFortune Chasi veZanu PF, vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti mitemo yese ivandudzwe kuitira kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo. Mumiri weMt Pleasant, VaSamuel Banda veMDC Alliance, vatiwo nyika inofanira kuva nemitemo inobata vanhu vese zvakaenzana zvisine kuti munhu ndewebato ripi. Mumiri weHarare West vari nhengo yeMDC Alliance, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, vaudza Studio7 kuti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti nhengo dzeparamende kubva kumapato ese, dzishande pamwe mukudzika mitemo nekuita basa rinobatsira mwana wese weZimbabwe. Mumiriri weGokwe-Nembudziya muNational Assembly, VaJustice Mayor Wadyajena veZanu PF, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanoda kushanda vasingatyityidzirwe nemakurukota ehurumende sezvaiitika muparamende yapfuura. Nhengo yeZanu PF, VaJoseph Chinotimba vekuBuhera South, vanoti vachashanda zvakasimbamukusimudzira vanhu vemudunhu ravo uye vatiwo vanoda kuti Studio7 ichitanga kutepfunyura iri muZimbabwe. Mumiri weGutu North, Amai Yeukai SimbanegaviveZanu PF, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachaedza pese pavanongona napo kuti vanhu vemunzvimbo yavo vawane mabasa. Paramende yagara ichionekwa seisina simba uye ichimanikidzwa kuitwa zvese zvese nemutungamiriri wenyika kana makurukota ake. Asi VaSettlement Chikwinyawa veMDC Alliance vachimirira Mbizo vati izvi hazvisi kuzoitika rwendo rwuno. Munyori weparamende, VaKennedy Chokuda, vagadza nhengo dzese mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe dzedare reNational Assembly nenhengo makumi masere dzeseneti. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson MNangagwa, vanotarisirwa kudomwa nhengo shanu kudare reseneti uye svondo rapfuura vakatodoma vatevedzeri vavo vaviri zvinoreva kuti vasarirwa kudoma nhengo nhatu chete. Matare maviri eparamende aya achagara svondo rinouya kuti asarudze mutauriri weNational Assembly pamwe nemutungamiri wedare reSenate. Pane nzvimbo dzinodarika makumi matatu dzeNational Assembly dziri kupikiswa neMDC Alliance mudare reElectoral Court, zvekuti vari kupikisa ava vakabudirira, vamwe vatoreswa mhiko nhasi vanorasikirwa nenzvimbo dzavo mudare iri, vanenge vanzi vakunda vachitoreswa mhiko yekuti vave nhengo dzedare iri. headline: America Yovimbisa Kudyidzana neAfrican Union Zvine Pundutso Mukati
text: Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha vanoti vatungamiri vemuAfrica vanofanirwa kutambira mashoko aVaJoe Biden zvine mutsindo nerukudzo mukati, uye vafunge zvakadzama kuti vangasimbaradze seyi hukama hwavo nehurumende itsva iri kutonga mu America. Mutungamiri weAmerica, Va Joe Biden, vatumira mashoko avo kuvatungamiri vemu Africa, avo vari kuita musangano wemazuva maviri padandemutande senzira yekuti vanhu vasatapurirane chirwere che Covid-19. VaBiden vaudza musangano weAfrican Union wechimakumi matatu nemana uyu kuti America yakagadzirira kuva sahwira wenyika dzemu Africa mukutsigirana, mukubatana pamwe nekuremekedzana. Vati izvi ndizvo zvinopa America kuti ishanda pamwe nemasangano epasi rose akaita se African Union. Vati pasi rose rinofanirwa kushanda pamwe chete kuitira kuzadzisa "shuviro yeremangwana rakanaka, remangwana rine kukura munyaya dzekutengeserana, kunopa pundutso kunyika dzose." VaBiden, avo vakagadzwa pachigaro chemutungamiri weAmerica mwedzi wapera mushure mekukunda VaDonald Trump veRepublican Party, vati nyika yavo "yakazvipira kuvaka zvakare mushandirapamwe pamwe nekubatsira vanhu vemu Africa pazvinhu zvose zvinosanganisira kurwisa chirwere che Covid-19 uye mukushanda neAfrican Union mukupedza mhirizhonga dziri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda muAfrica yose." Mutungamiri weAmerica atiwo America yakagadzirira kuva sahwira we Africa, uye inodavira zvinoitwa nenyika dzemu Africa. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo paine zvipingaidzo zvihombe, “hapana kupokana kuti nyika dzedu, vanhu vedu, pamwe neAfrican Union, vakazvipira kugadzirisa zvipingaidzo zvose.” No media source currently available Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika pamwe nekufambiswa kwemabhizinesi pasi rose, Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanoti vatungamiri vemuAfrica vanofanirwa kutambira mashoko aVa Biden zvine mutsindo nerukudzo mukati, uye vafunge zvakadzama kuti vangasimbaradze seyi hukama hwavo nehurumende itsva iri kutonga mu America. Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti kuti Zimbabwe idyidzane zvemhando yepamusoro soro munyaya dzemabhizinesi, hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inofanirwa kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu chinova chinhu chakaita kuti vamwe vakuru vakuru vatemerwe zvirango neAmerica. Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti Zimbabwe ikaratidza kuti yava kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu uye mapurisa nemasoja ayo achibata vemuZimbabwe zvine chiremera, Zimbabwe inogona kudyidzana nemabhizinesi ekuAmerica nenzira inoita kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimudzirwe. Asi Zimbabwe inoti iri kuomeserwa nekuti yakatorera varungu mapurazi ichiapa kuvanhu vatema. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Yoyambira Vanoda Kuratidzira
text: Zanu PF inoti inomira nemashoko akataurwa nemutungamiri wayo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamusangano wakaitwa nemusi weChishanu mudare rePolitburo yebato iri. VaMnangagwa, avo vanove zvakare mutungamiri wenyika, vakayambira masangano evashandi, machechi, nemasangano akazvimirira, kuti anangane nemabasa awo ari pamutemo, kwete kupindira mune zvematongerwo enyika. VaMangagwa vakatiwo vanozviziva kuti masangano aya ari kushanda nemapato anopikisa muda kuvhiringidza mashandiro ehurumende yavo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, avo vanoti ichokwadi kuti masangano akazvimirira aya ava kuita zvematongerwo enyika achisiya basa rekuchengetedza kodzero dzevashandi. VaMugwadi vanoti hurumende inozviziva kuti masangano aya ari kuda kuratidzira zvisiri pamutemo, uye mapurisa achange achiita basa rawo nemazvo mukuona kuti hapana anobvumidzwa kutyora mitemo yenyika munguva ino yeCovid-19. VaMugwadi vatiwo sangano guru reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, riri kuita zvematongerwo enyika. Vati mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vakamboyedza kuyananisa vatungamiri veMDC vari kunetsana, izvo zvinoburitsa pachena kuti sangano iri rinodyidzana nemapato anopikisa hurumende. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata VaMutasa kanawo MDC kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti sevashandi vane kodzero dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika, vanoshushikana zvikuru nemashoko aVaMnangagwa. VaMasaraure vanoti vashandi havasi kuzofa vakanyarara kana hurumende ichitadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzemihoro yavo, uye vacharamba vachitaura zvinyunyuto zvavo. Asi VaMugwadi vati hurumende inonzwisisa zvikuru zvichemo zvevashandi ndosaka yakawedzera mihoro yevashandi vehurumende nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana, pamusoro pezvo, ikavapa zvakare madhora ekuAmerica makumi manomwe nemashanu semari yekubatsirikana munguva yekurwisa Covid-19. headline: America Inoti Kutadza Kutonga kwaVaMnangagwa Ndiko Kuri Kuvhiringa Hupfumi hweZimbabwe, Kwete Zvirango
text: America inoti zvirango zvayakatemera vakuru vakuru muZimbabwe hazvisirizvo zviri kukonzera kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika ichiti hurumende yeZimbabwe ndiyo iri kutadza kutungamira zvakanaka. Izvi zvinotevera gwaro rakaburitswa nenhumwa yeUnited Nations, Amai Alena Douhan, avo vakati zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nehurumende yeAmerica pamwe nedzimwe nyika dzekumavirira zviri kukanganisa raramo yeveruzhinji munyika. Mumiriri weAmerica kusangano reUnited Nations, Ambassador Linda Thomas Greenfield, vaudza vatori venhau nhasi vari kuNew York kuti kutadza kutungamira zvakanaka kwehurumende yeZimbabwe ndiko kuri kukonzera kutambura kweveruzhinji munyika kwete zvirango zvakaiswa nehurumende yavo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemumiriri wesangano reEuropean Union, VaTimo Olkonnen, kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya yezvirango iyi sezvo pataenda pamhepo vanga vasati vapindura mibunzo yavati tivatumire. Asi EU yakataura munguva pfupi yadarika kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika isati yabvisa zvirango. Muzinda weBritain muZimbabwe wakaburitsa mashoko padandemutande rawo reTwitter mazuva mashomanana adarika uchiti kutengesera pakati peBritain neZimbabwe kuri kufamba zvakanaka zvisinei nezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vari muZanu PF. Gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati togozovafonera sezvo vanga vachiti vakabatikana nemusangano weZanu PF wepagore uri kuitirwa kuBindura. Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weZanu PF, VaMike Bimha, vati zvirango zviri kuonesa pfumvu munhu wese munyika zvisinei nekuti munhu anotsigira baro ripi rezvematongerwo enyika. VaBimha vati Zimbabwe iri kuoneswa ndondo nenyika dzekumavirira nepamusana pekutorwa kwakaitwa minda kubva kuvarimi vechichena ichigoverwa kuvanhu vatema. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzevamatongerwo enyika, VaRashweat Mukundu, vati zvirango zviripo hazvisi zvirango zvehupfumi ndokusaka Zimbabwe ichikwanisa kutengeserana nenyika dzacho dzakaisa zvirango izvi uye vati havaone nyika idzi dzichibvisa zvirango izvi kana Zimbabwe isina kugadzirisa zvikonzero zvakaita kuti zvirango izvi zviiswe kubva pakutanga. Kunyange gwaro raAmai Douhan rakakurudzira kuti America irege kushandisa mutemo weZidera kuti irambe yakaisa zvirango izvi vachiti zvirango izvi hazvisi pamutemo sezvo zvisina kubvumidzwa neUnited Nations Security Council, Amai Greenfield vati hurumende yavo haisi kuzodyira huroyi mukunyara vachiti hurumende yavo icharambawo yakatsika madziro panyaya yekuti kodzero dzevanhu dzicherechedzwe muZimbabwe. Amai Douhan, avo vakanga vari munyika kwemazuva gumi adarika vachiongorora nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika uye kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzekumavirira zviri kukanganisa hupenyu hweveruzhinji zvakadii munyika, vakati ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwuri kunhonga svosve nemuromo pamusana pezvirango izvi. Amai Douhan vakakurudzira Zimbabwe kuti iite nhaurirano dzechokwadi nenyika dzakatemera zvirango nechinangwa chekuti zvirango izvi zvigobviswa vakatiwo hurumende yeZimbabwe pachayo inofanira kuona kuti munyika maitwa nhaurirano dzemandorokwati munyika pamwe nedzimwe nyika dzakaisa zvirango izvi. Nyika dzakatemera Zimbabwe zvirango dzinosanganisira America, Australia, Britain, Canada, Switzerland pamwe nesangano renyika dziri mugungano reEuropean Union. Amai Douhan vakatarisirwa kusvitsa gwaro rezvavakawana muongororo yavo kumusangano weUnited Nations Human Rights Council uchaitwa muna Gunyana wegore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: VaMutasa Vanobvuma Kutongwa neKomiti yeZanu-PF
text: Nyaya yekusawirirana mubato reZanu-PF yatanga zvakare mushure mekudzoka munyika kwemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe. Kudzoka kwavo nesvondo kwava kureva kuti vaive murongi wemabasa mubato, VaDidymus Mutasa, vanenge votongwa nekomiti yakaumbwa iri kutungamirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko. VaMutasa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachaenda kudare iri. No media source currently available Vamwe vari mukomiti iyi vanosanganisira Amai Mugabe semutungamiri weWomens League, vanoona nezvemabasa ematongwerwo enyika mubato, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, munyori wezvemitemo, VaPatrick Chinamasa, munyori wevechidiki, VaPupurai Togarepi, uye nhengo yePolitburo, VaKembo Mohadi. Mutauriri webato, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vakazivisa svondo rapera kuti kutongwa kwaVaMutasa kunotanga chete kana Amai Mugabe vadzoka kubva kunyika dzekumawirira.

headline: MDC T Yoronga Musangano Mukuru weKupeta Gore kuZimbabwe Grounds
text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC T, VaMorgan Tsvangirai mangwana vari kutarisirwa kutungamira nhengo dzavo pamusangano mukuru wekuvhara gore uchaitirwa munhandare ine nhoroondo yekurwira rusununguko rwevatema yeZimbabwe Grounds iri mumusha weHighfield. Mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vanoti chinangwa chikuru chemusangano uyu ndechekutarisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika pari zvino, pasvika hurongwa hwemubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa pakatarisanwa nesarudzo dza2018, pamwe nekutendawo vana veZimbabwe nekushinga kunyange vari mukati mematambudziko makukutu. VaGutu vanoti zvimwe zvicha kurukurwawo ndezvakaitwa nebato ravo mukati megore rino, zvinosanganisira kuratidzira mumatunhu akasiyana-siyana enyika. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T Yoshora Mashoko aVaMudarikwa veZanu PF
text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nemashoko anonzi akataurwa nemumiriri weUzumba muparamende, VaSimbaneuta Mudarikwa vebato reZanu PF, ekuti dunhu ravo harina nzvimbo yemapato anopikisa. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti mashoko aVaMudarikwa aya anokonzeresa mhirizhonga sezvo dunhu ravo reUzumba, kusanganisira Mashonaland East yose, ragara richizivikanwa nenyaya dzemhirizhonga. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamabiko ekupemberera kuparurwa kwehurongwa hwemadiridziro kuMudzi, VaMudarikwa vanonzi vakati bato ravo richawana mavhoti zviuru makumi masere mudunhu mavo, vakawedzera vachiti mapato anopikisa achangowana mavhoti ari pasi pemapepa ekuvhotesa akakanganiswa kana kuti ma spoilt ballot papers. Asi VaMudarikwa varamba mashoko avari kupomerwa ekukurudzira mhirizhonga, vachiti bato reMDC-T ndiro rinotori pamberi panyaya dzemhirizhonga. Vanotiwo pahuwandu hwemavhoti achawanikwa neZanu PF, vari kureva kuti vanhu mudunhu ravo vari kuberekana vachiwanda. No media source currently available

headline: Muzvare Nyagomo Vokurudzira Vari Kunze Kunonyoresa Kuvhota
text: Mutungamiri werimwe remapato anopikisa, reProgressive Democrats of Zimbabwe, Muzvare Barbara Nyagomo, vanoti bato ravo riri kushanda zvakasimba kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe vari munyika dzakapoteredza nyika vadzokere kumusha kunonyoresa kuti vazokwanisa kuvhota musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Muzvare Nyagomo vanoti vari kuita izvi munyika dzakaita seSouth Africa, Mozambique, Botswana neZambia. "Isusu tiri kunyanya kuisa simba rakawanda muSouth Africa, mune vana veZimbabwe vazhinji vatinoziva kuti vanokwanisa kuenda kumba vachino register kuti vavhote. Saka tiri kuita voters education ne awareness kuti vazive kuti sei vachifanira kuti vano register izvozvi, chero vakanga vaka register kubva muna 1980," Muzvare Nyagomo vanodaro. Muzvare Nyagomo, avo vari kuManchester kuBritain, vanoti hapana imwe nzira yekuti vari kunze kwenyika vakwanise kupinda musarudzo kunze kwekutoenda kumusha kunonyoresa, sezvo Zimbwbwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yakatozivisa kare kuti haina mari yekuti ikwanise kunyoresa vese vari kunze kwenyika vari munyika dzavari kugara. Bato reProgressive Democrats of Zimbabwe riri mumubatanidzwa wemapato ari kurwira kuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo ivandudzwe, weNational Electoral Reform Agenda, NERA. Mapato ari mumibatanidzwa yeNERA neCODE ari muSouth Africa pari zvino munhaurirano dzinonzi dzakanangana nekuedza kuumba mubatanidzwa pakati pemapoka maviri aya. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Inoramba Gwaro Riri Kuti Sarudzo dzeBy-Election Dzichaitwa Gore Rinouya Muna Kubvumbi
text: Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yaramba mashoko ari mugwaro riri kutenderera pamadandemutande ekuti yakatara musi wa 23 Kubvumbi 2022 sezuva ringangoitwa sarudzo dzema by-elections dzeparamende pamwe nemakanzuru. Mukuru anoona nezvesarudzo kana kuti Chief Elections Officer veZEC, Va Utoile Silaigwana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mashoko aya handi echokwadi vakati tibate mutauriri weZEC, Commissioer Kzembe kuti tinzwe zvizhinji, asi takundikana kuvabata. Gwaro riri kutenderera iri rakanyorwa pabepa reZEC, asi harina kuiswa runyoro kana kuti kusainwa kana kudhindwa neboka rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika iri. Asi mamwe masangano pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo vanga vatoratidza mufaro mukuru kwazvo nemashoko ekuti sarudzo idzi dzingangoitwa gore rinouya, vachiti kushaikwa kwevamiriri mumatare eparamende pamwe nemumakanzuru kuri kudzorera shure mabasa ebudiriro mumatunhu asina vamiriri. Mabasa ose ane chekuita nesarudzo akambomiswa muna Kurume 2020 senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Matunhu akawanda akasara asina humiriri zvichitevera kudzingwa kwedzimwe nhengo dzeparamende nekanzuru nebato reMDC-T dzichinzi dzakasiya bato iri dzichienda kuMDC Alliance, uyewo kushaya kwedzimwe nhengo. Zvigaro makumi maviri nezvisere zveparamende hazvina vamiriri kuchitiwo zvimwe zana nezvishanu zvemakanzuru zvisinawo humiriri. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa musangano re Elections Resource Centre, VaSolomon Bobosibunu, vanoti dai gwaro iri ranga raburitswa neZEC zviri pamutemo changa chiri chinhu chakanaka chose kuti sarudzo idzi dzichiitwa sezvo kunonoka kwadzo kuri kutotyora kodzero dzevanhu dzavanopiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. headline: Amai Joice Mujuru Vokurudzirwa Kuzvichenura Pane Zvakaitika Vachiri muZanu PF
text: Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Va Edgar Gweshe, vanoti Amai Mujuru vanofanira kuzvichenura panyaya yekubirirwa kunonzi kwakaitwa sarudzo pamwe nekutyora kwekodzero. Veruzhinji vanoti bato idzva reZimbabwe People First iro riri kufanotungamirwa nevaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, rinofanira kushanda zvakasimba kuti rikwanise kubvisa hurumende yeZanu PF iyo yave nemakore makumi matatu nematanhatu iri muhutongi. Veruzhinji vataura neStudio 7 muHarare vanoti Amai Mujuru, avo vakaparura bato ravo re Zimbabwe People First nezuro, vanofanira kusunga dzisimbe kuti vakwanise kukurira Zanu PF musarudzo dzemuna 2018. Mumwe wevanhu ava ndiVa Beven Chihuri avo vanogara mumusha weMabvuku muno muHarare. VaChihuri vanoti Amai Mujuru vane mukana wakakura kwazvo wekutora masimba kubva kuna Va Mugabe. Zvataurwa naVa Chihuri zvatsinhirwa naVa Kudzanai Musenha vanogara kuWestgate. Va Musenha vati Amai Mujuru semunhu anga ari muhurumende kubva pakawana nyika kuzvitonga kuzere muna 1980, vave munhu ane rutsigiro rwakakura kwazvo kune vari muchiuto avo vakabuda pachena kuti havadi kutongwa nemunhu asina kurwa muhondo yerusununguko. Mushure mekuparura kwavakaita bato ravo, mumwe mutsigiri weZimbabwe People First, Amai Patience Madzima, vakati Amai Mujuru ndivo vega munhu anobva kubato rinopikisa anogona kuita kuti munyika muve nerunyararo kana Zanu PF ikakundwa musarudzo. Asi mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Va Edgar Gweshe, vanoti Amai Mujuru vanofanira kuzvichenura panyaya yekubirirwa kunonzi kwakaitwa sarudzo pamwe nekutyora kwekodzero. MDC inotungamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai inoti sarudzo dzapfuura dzakabirirwa zvemhango yepamusoro-soro asi VaMugabe nebato ravo vanoti sarudzo idzi dzakaitwa zviri pachena. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano reCoalition Against Corruption, Va Terry Mutsvanga, vanoti Amai Mujuru vane dambudziko rekuti vakanga vari muhurumende yeZanu PF yavanoti yashungurudza vanhu kwenguva yakareba. Zvichakadai, mupepeti webepanhau reThe Observer, Va Barnabas Thondlana, vanoti Amai Mujuru vanofanira kubatana nemamwe mapato anopikisa kana vakamira pachokwadi kuti vari kuda kunyurura zvizvarwa kubvamumadhaka azviri. Va Thondlana vanoti Amai Mujuru vakamira vari vega havana mukana wekukunda Zanu PF musarudzo pakatarisirwa mhirizhonga inowanzoitwa munguva dzesarudzo Zanu PF ichishanda pamwechete nevari muchiuto. Nyanzvi munyaya dzevematongerwo enyika dzinoti mapato anopikisa akapinda musarudzo dzemuna 2018 asina kubatana zvinopa Zanu PF mukana wakakura kwazvo wekukunda musarudzo idzi. Nyaznvi idzi dzinotiwo mapato anopikisa anofanira kutanga nhaurirano dzekuwumba mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa pachine nguva yekuti mapato aya agogadzirira sarudzo dzemuna 2018 zvakakwana. Zvichakadai, Va Tsvangirai naAmai Mujuru vakabuda pachena kuti nhaurirano idzi hadzisati dzatanga uye VaTsvangirai vakatoudza vatsigiri vavo kuti vagadzirire kupinda musarudzo dzemuna 2018 vakazvimirira sebato reMDC-T. Kunyange hazvo vemapato ese anopikisa hurumende vachiti vakazvipira kubatana pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018, hapana chinobatika chavati vaita panyaya dzenhaurirano dzekuwumba mubatanidzwa uyu. headline: VaTomana Voridzirwa Pito Vachinzi Vatadza Basa
text: Judiciary Service Commission, JSC, inoti gweta guru renyika, VaJohannes Tomana, vanofanira kusiya basa nenyaya yekusatevedzera mitongo yematare epamusoro sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo. Judiciary Service Commission, JSC, inoti gweta guru renyika, VaJohannes Tomana, vanofanira kusiya basa nenyaya yekusatevedzera mitongo yematare epamusoro sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo. JSC ina sachigaro uye ari mutongi mukuru wematare, VaGodfrey Chidyausiku, pamwe nedzimwe nhengo dzinosanganisira mutongo mutungamiri wedare repamusoro pamwe nevamwe vatongi vedare iri. JSC inoti VaTomana havachakodzere zvachose kuti vave gweta guru rehurumende uye nyaya yekuti vakatopotsa vaendeswa kujeri panyaya yavairamba kuchuchisa nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Kereke, vari kupomwera mhosva yekubata chibharo, munongedzo wekuti munhu asisafanire kuva muhofisi. Studio7 yange yatoudzwa neMuvhuro nevamwe vakuru muhurumende kuti VaMugabe vave mubishi kuumba komiti yekutanga kuferefeta VaTomana uye vakabatwa nemhosva, vanodzingwa basa. Asi VaTomana vatokwira kudare repamusoro vachiti zviri kuitwa neJSC hazvisi pamutemo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaTomana kanawo gweta ravo, VaThabani Mpofu. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo, uye vachidzidzisa mitemo paKent University kuBritain, Doctor Alex Magaisa, vanoti havaoni VaTomana vachipona munyaya yasimudzwa neJSC. headline: Mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, Voshanyira Zimbabwe
text: Mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, vasvika munyika umo vari kutarisirwa kupinda mumisangano neChina wekuchanyorerana zvibvumirano nemumwe wavo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Makurokata enyika mbiri idzi anowona nezvekudyidzana kwenyika vaita misangano yavo neChitatu vachigadzirira musangano mukuru wevatungamiri wenyika mbiri idzi uchaitwa neChina. Mashoko aburitswa anoti VaMnangagwa naVaMasisi vachanyorerana chibvumirano chekukweretesa mari makambani emuZimbabwe sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka muZimbabwe. Asi mashoko ari kubva kuBotswana anoti hapana mari ichapihwa Zimbabwe sezvo zvakambenge zvawirirana pakutanga, zvashanduka. Munyori mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaGaeimelwe Goitsemang, vaudza nhepfenyuro ye Yarona FM kuti chibvumirano chakanga chaitwa neZimbabwe nenyika yavo chekuti Botswana ikweretese Zimbabwe mamiriyoni mazana mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica, hachisipo. Mari iyi yaifanirwa kushandiswa mukuvandudza kucherwa kwemangoda kuitira kuti nyika iwane mari kubva mumangoda ayo ari muminda yekwaMarange. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaGodfrey Kanyenze, vanoti misangano yakadai yakakosha mukugadzirisa hukama hweZimbabwe neBotswana. VaKanyenze vanoti zvichabuda mumusangano pakati pevatungamiri vaviri ava zvinokwanisa kujekesa hudzamu hwekudyidzana nekugarisana kweZimbabwe neBotswana sezvo vatungamiri venyika mbiri idzi vachiri vatsva vose. headline: Amai Grace Mugabe Votuka Zvakare Amai Mujuru neMDC
text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mygabe, vati vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, havazofa vakavigwa pamarinda anovigwa magamba enyika nepamusana pekuti vakapandukira mutungamiri wenyika,Va Robert Mugabe. Vachitaura neChitatu nevatsigiri vebato ravo paChimhanda Secondary School ku Rushinga mudunhu reMashonaland Central, munyori muboka remadzimai reZanu PF reWomen’s League, Amai Grace Mugabe, vashora Amai Mujuru nekuda chigaro chaVa Mugabe vachiti Amai Mujuru havazofi vakavigwa pa Heroes Acre nokuti vakazvidza mutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available Amai Mugabe vati kunze kunotonhora kana munhu achinge asiri mu Zanu PF. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kutaura naAmai Mujuru kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Amai Mugabe vaenderera mberi vachiti mapato anopikisa haafanirwe kubvumidzwa kupinda mudunhu reMashonaland Central vachiti dunhu iri ndere Zanu PF. Amai Mugabe varambawo mashoko ari kubuda mumapepanhau ekuti ndivo vari kutungamira chipoka chemuZanu PF chiri kudaidzwa kuti G40 kana kuti Generation 40 icho chinonzi chakateya kutora masimba kubva kuna Va Mugabe kana vachinge vabva pachigaro. Zvinonzi muZanu PF mune kusawirirana zvakanyanya panyaya yekuti achatora matomhu kubva kuna Va Mugabe ndiyani. Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika atorawo zvakare mukana uyu kutsoropodza vaimbova mutungamiri weBritain, Va Tony Blair, pamwe naVa George Bush vaimbova mutungamiri weAmerica vachiti vaviri ava vanofanirwa kutongwa kudare re International Criminal Court. Va Mugabe vanowanzotukawo America ne Britain pese pavanowana mukana wekutaura paruzhinji sezvaitwa nemudzimai wavo nhasi. Kunyange hazvo mhuri yaVa Mugabe ine mapurazi akawanda, mazhinji acho ari pasi pekambani inonzi Gushungo Holdings, Amai Mugabe vashora vakuru vakuru muhurumende vakatora mapurazi akawanda avasiri kushandisa nemhazvo. Zvichakadai, Amai Mugabe vatorawo mukana uyu kutuka vatori venhau vachiti vanonyora manyepo. Mumwe mutori wenhau ane mukurumbira munyika uye vari mupepeti webepanhau re The Observer, Va Barnabas Thondlana, varatidza kusafara nemashoko aAmai Mugabe aya vachiti vatori venhau vanofanirwa kusiiwa vachiita basa ravo vakasununguk Amai Mugabe vasiya vagovera matarakita, mbatya, shangu, ma computer pamwe nechikafu kuvagari veku Mashonaland Central vachiti havana basa nekuti vemapato anopikisa anoti chii panyaya dzekutenga mavhoti vachiti yatokwana nguva yekuti bato ravo ritsvage rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018. Amai Mugabe vakatarisirwa kuita misangano nevatsigiri vavo mumatunhu ose enyika kwavanoti vachafamba vachigovera zvinhu vachiti zvavari kuita kuzadzikisa zviri muchirongwa chekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika che Zimbabwe Agenda for Sustainable Socio Economic Transformation kana kuti Zimasset.

headline: MDC Inoti Kuratidzira Kwayo Kuri Kuenderera Mberi neMusi weChishanu
text: MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inoti iri kuenderera mberi nehurongwa hwayo hwekuratidzira nemusi weChishanu, kunyange hazvo isati yanzwa kubva kumapurisa. MDC yakazivisa mapurisa svondo rapera kuti ichapinda mukuratidzira uku sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika. Asi bato iri rinoti kusapindura kwemapurisa hakusi kuzotadzisa hurongwa hwekuratidzira uhu, sezvo bumbiro remitemo yenyika ichiripa kodzero yekuratidzira. MDC inoti iri kuratidzira sezvo isiri kufara nehutongi hwemutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo bato iri rinoti haricherechedzi kusarudzwa kwavakaitwa gore rapera. Sangano rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika, reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, rakazivisa gore rapera kuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakanga vakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Asi MDC yakapikisa izvi mudare reConstitutional Court, iro rakapa mutongo waitambira zvakanga zvaziviswa musarudzo dzegore rapera nasachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Priscilla Chigumba. Asi MDC inoti VaMnangagwa vari kutadza kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika, izvo zviri kupa kuti nyika ishaye magetsi, mafuta edzimotokari, uye kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu mazuva ose. Murongi wemisangano muMDC, VaAmos Chibaya, vanoti kuratidzira kwavo kuchaitwa murunyararo sezvo vagara vari bato rinoremekedza mitemo yenyika. VaChibaya vanoti zvisineyi kuti havasati vawana mhinduro kubva kumapurisa, kuratidzira kwavo kuri kuenderera mberi nemusi weChishanu. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi, vanoti MDC inogara yakati ichaita ratidziro murunyararo asi ichizopedzisira yaita mhirizhonga. VaMutodi vanotiwo sebato reZanu PF riri kutonga, vari kuzviziva kuti MDC iri kuratidzira kuitira kuti VaMnangagwa vabviswe pachigaro. “Vakuru vari kuti vachange vari mberi mekuratidzira uku ndinovayambira kuti vasazoyeuka bako vanaiwa,” vadaro VaMutodi. Asi VaChibaya vanoti vari kuzviziva kuti Zanu PF iri kugadzira zvipfeko zveMDC zvichapihwa vanhu kuti vazovhiringa kuratidzira kwakarongwa nebato ravo. Senzira yekuti izvi zvisaitike, VaChibaya vanoti vachange vaine nhengo dzebato ravo dzichachengetedza runyararo, uye pakaita nhubu dzinoda kukonzera mhirizhonga, vachadzibata vachidziisa mumaoko emapurisa. Muna Ndira, sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rakadaidzira kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo kwemazuva matatu. Asi vanhu vakapinda mumigwagwa iyi vachiratidzira. Kuratidzira uku kwakapedzisira kwaita mhirizhonga iyo yakaona vanhu vanosvika makumi maviri vachifa mushure mekupfurwa nemabara epfuti. Sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, rinoti pamhirizhonga yakaitika muna Ndira, pane vanhu makumi matanhatu nevasere vakarapwa maronda akakonzerwa nemabara epfuti, uye vanhu vanodarika zana vaive nemaronda airatidza kuti akakonzerwa nesimbi nezvimwe zvombo zvinocheka. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti mumazuva matatu akadaidzirwa neZCTU kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo, vakaona mapurisa achishandisa zvombo zvehutsi hunokachidza pavanhu vairatidzira vasina zvombo, uye vakaonawo masoja aive nepfuti dzemhando yeAK-47. headline: Makobvu neMatete Okandiranwa Muparamende neNyaya yaVaDzamara
text: Muparamende makandiranwa makobvu nematete nhengo dzeparamende dzichibvunza gurukota rezvemitemo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamire hurumende panyaya yekupambwa kwemurwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaItai Dzamara. VaMnangagwa, avo vanova zvakare mutevedzeri wekutanga wemutungamiri wenyika, vati vari kushushukanawo nekushaikwa kwaVaDzamara. VaMnangagwa vati mutemo uchashandiswa zvakadzama pakuranga vakapamba VaDzamara. Mutauriri vemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, vanoti vari kuferefeta nyaya iyi. Pamboita runyerekupe rwekuti VaDzamara vange vari mumaoko emapurisa kuHarare Central Police Station. Asi gweta raVaDzamara, VaCharles Kwaramba, vati mapurisa avaudza kuti vachiri mubishi kutsvaga VaDzamara. VaDzamara vakapambwa neMuvhuro muGlen View nevanhu vaive mumotokari yemhando yeIsuzu. headline: Dare rePamusoro Soro Rozeya Gakava Pakati paVaChamisa naAmai Khupe
text: Dare repamusoro-soro reSupreme Court nhasi ranzwa chikumbiro chemutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, chekuti mutongo wakaturwa nedare repamusoro reHigh Court wekuti kusarudzwa kwavo semutungamiri webato ravo hakuna kufambiswa zvakanaka usendekwe parutivi. Vachisvitsa chikumbiro chavo kudare, gweta raVaChamisa, Advocate Thabani Mpofu, vati mutongo wedare reHigh Court unofanira kusendekwa parutivi vachiti harisi basa rematare kusarudzira bato rezvematongerwo enyika hutungamiri. VaMpofu vaudza dare kuti komiti yepamusoro-soro muMDC pakati pemakongiresi yeNational Council yakatora danho rekugadza VaChamisa semutungamiri weMDC zvichitevera kufa kwavaimbova mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai. VaMpofu vati komiti iyi ndiyo ine masimba ekuita izvi ndokusaka zvakaitwa uye vati VaChamisa naVaElias Mudzuri vakagadzwa naVaTsvangirai sevatevedzeri kunyangwe zvazvo paiva naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe zvichiitwa VaTsvangirai vachishandisa masimba avaive nawo ari mubumbiro reMDC. Zvataurwa naVaMpofu zvatsinhirwa nemunyori anoona nezvesarudzo muMDC yaVaChamisa, VaJacob Mafume, avo vanga vari mudare. Gweta riri kumiririra Muzvare Khupe panyaya iyi, VaLovemore Madhuku, vaudzawo dare kuti pasi pebumbiro remitemo reMDC hazvikwanisike kuti pave nevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato vaviri kana vatatu sezvo vachiti bumbiro iri riri pachena kuti panofanira kunge paine mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato mumwechete. VaMadhuku vati Muzvare Khupe ndivo vaifanira kufanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weMDC pakamirirwa kuitwa kongiresi yechimbichimbi yekutsvaga mutungamiri webato zvichitevera kufa kwakaita VaTsvangirai. VaMadhuku vaenderera mberi vachiti kudomwa kwaVaChamisa naVaMudzuri kuti vave vatevedzeri vaVaTsvangirai kwaive kunze kwemutemo. Vaenderera mberi kudaidzirwa kwaitwa musangano weNational Council wakagadza VaChamisa semutungamiri webato kwaiva kunze kwemutemo sezvo vachiti bumbiro reMDC riri pachena kuti misangano yechimbichimbi yekomiti iyi inokwanisa kushevedzerwa nemutungamiri webato chete kana mutevedzeri wake. Zvichakadai, dare reSupreme Court iro range riine vatongi vatatu vanoti VaPaddington Garwe, Amai Antonia Guvava naVaBharat Patel, rati richazotura mutongo waro muzuva rarisina kutara. Nyaya iyi isati yapinda mudare, mapurisa anorwisa mhirizhonga ayo anga akapakatira zvombo arambidza vatsigiri veMDC vanga vauya kuzonzwa nyaya iyi kupinda mudare ndokuvadzinga pamatare apa izvo zvashorwa nemumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaChamisa, Amai Lynette Karenyi Kore. Nyaya iyi yakaunzwa kumatare neimwe nhengo yeMDC yekuGokwe, VaElias Mashavira, avo vaiti VaChamisa havana kusarudzwa kuti vatungamire bato zviri pachena izvo zvakatambirwa nedare High Court. Asi VaChamisa vakazokwidza nyaya iyi kudare reSuupreme Court vachiti mutongo wedare reHigh Court unofanira kusendekwa parutivi. No media source currently available

headline: HATITYE SRI LANKA: GEMS
text: ari kuLIVERPOOL, England naAbel Ndooka ari muHARARE KAPUTENI wechikwata chenyika chenetball chemaGems — Perpetual Siyachitema — anoti vacharwa semvumba uye vanoda kusimudzira mureza weZimbabwe kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup ayo ari kuitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland.   Achitaura neKwayedza, Siyachitema anoti maGems achatamba nemwoyo wose kuti vagohwina mitambo yavo vagopedza vari pakati pezvikwata zvikuru zviri kumakwishu aya.   MaGems ari muboka reGroup A umo achasangana nezvikwata zvinoti Australia — iyo inove shasha ine mukombe wenetball — Sri Lanka neNorthen Ireland.   Mutambo wekutanga wechikwata chenyika ichi uriko musi weChishanu chino apo chichasangana neSri Lanka kunhandare yeM&S Bank Arena kuLiverpool Court Two.   Mushure mezvo, maGems achazosangana neAustralia musi weMugovera ozopedzisira neNorthen Ireland musi weSvondo.   Siyachitema anoti kubva zvavakasvika kuEngland, vange vachiongorora mitambo yeSri Lanka iyo yavachasangana navo mumutambo wekutanga ndokuona kuti vatambi vayo varefu zvikuru kusiyana navo sezvo vakati pfupikei.   “Takaongorora chikwata cheSri Lanka, chine vatambi varefu zvikuru kudarika isu asi murairidzi wedu akatsvaga nzira dzekuti tinogona kuvakunda sei.   “Zvekureba kwavo hatisi kuzozvitarisa uye hazvireve kuti vachatikunda, isu ticharwa semvumba mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Isu senyika pasi rese tiri pechi13 pakutamba netball saka kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup tiri kuda kurwa zvakasimba totamba sechikwata kuti tirpedze tiri mutop 8.”   Achitaura pamusoro perutsigiro rwavakawana kubva kumakambani akasiyana anosanganisira Simbisa Brands, Econet, National Foods nemamwe, Siyachitema anoti zvakavasimudzira morari yavo uye zvave kuvatuma kuti vashande nesimba kumakwishu aya.   “Tinotenda zvikuru makambani ese akatibatsira kuti rwendo rwedu rureruke kuenda kumakwishu aya, zvaisava nyore kudai vasipo saka tinotenda zvikuru.   “Rutsigiro rwatawana rwaunza mufaro kwatiri isu vanasikana veZimbabwe uye zvave kutituma kuti titambe nesimba kumakwishu aya,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Pazvikwata zvese zvemuAfrica, maGems ari kumakwishu aya nezvimwe zvikwata zvinoti South Africa, Uganda neMalawi.   Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Netball Association, Leticia Chipandu, anoti vasikana vemaGems vacharwa vamire mumitambo yavo.   Kubva kare, zvikwata zvizhinji zvaikwikwidza kumakwishu epasi rose akasiyana hazvina kumbobvira zvauya nemukombe izvo zvakapedzisira kuitwa nechikwata chemaGolden Girls icho chakahwina menduru yegoridhe kumaOlympics mugore ra1980.   Asi, Chipandu anoti rwendo rwuno zviri kuzoshanduka.   “Chandinovimbisa ndechekuti hatisi kungoburitswa mumutambo uyu uchangotanga, izvo kwete bodo.   “Vasikana vachatamba kusvika kumagumo uye ndinokuvimbisai kuti tichaunza mufaro mukuru kunyika yedu kubva kumakwishu aya,” anodaro Chipandu.

headline: Hatina chekutaura: Zifa
text: MUTAURIRI weZimbabwe Football Association – Xolisani Gwesela – anoti havana chekutaura zvichitevera kumbomiswa basa kwaitwa vatungamiri veZifa neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) nhasi.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti Zifa inoti kudii nedanho ratorwa neSRC, Gwesela anoti, “Handikwanise kupindura mubvunzo iwoyo, kana muchida kuziva zvakawanda taurai neSRC mubvunze zvose vanokubatsirai.”   Nhasi mangwanani SRC yazivisa nezvekumisa kwayaita basa bhodhi reZifa nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakawanda izvo iri kupomera sangano renhabvu iro rinotungamirirwa naFelton Kamambo.   Zvimwe zvezvikonzero zvamisirwa Zifa basa zvinosanganisira kusashandisa nemazvo mari yeveruzhinji pamwe nekutadza kupa umboo hwekuti mari iyi yakashandiswei, kutumira zvikwata zvenyika kunokwikwidza kumitambo yakasiyana kunze zvisina kupihwa mvumo sezvinodiwa pasi pemutemo wekurwisa denda reCovid-19 uye mashoko ekushungurudzwa kwevaridzi vepembe vechidzimai.   Nyika yamirira kuona kuti sangano reFifa richatora matanho api kuZimbabwe sezvo isingatendere kuti hurumende dzipindire munyaya dzenhabvu.

headline: Highlanders Yopemberera Kusvitsa Makore Makumi Mapfumbamwe
text: Pamusoro pezvo kuchave nemabiko ekupembera kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe kwechikwata cheHighlanders uko mukuru wacho, VaNadumiso Gumede, vakavimbisa mumimhanzi pamwe nenhabvu zvepamusoro soro muBarbourfields Stadium neMugovera. Vatsigiri venhabvu vatarisana nemabiko anofadza mukupera kwesvondo. Kubva kumitambo yemuAfrica kusvika kumakwikwi eZimbabwe National Army Charity Challenge, kuchave nemachikichori enhabvu ayo anga achingotaurwa nezvawo svondo rese. Pamusoro pezvo kuchave nemabiko ekupembera kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe kwechikwata cheHighlanders uko mukuru wacho, VaNadumiso Gumede, vakavimbisa mumimhanzi pamwe nenhabvu zvepamusoro soro muBarbourfields Stadium neMugovera. No media source currently available Asi mutambo uri pamuromo pevazhinji ndeuyo uri kuSouth Africa apo chikwata cheChicken Inn chiri kutarisira kudimbura muswe chikwata chemaBrazilains icho chiri kuparadza zvimwe zvikwata. Mutambi ane mukurmbira muZimbabwe, asi achitambira Memelodi Sundowns, Khama Billiart, achenge ari mumutambo uyu kunyange hazvo asina kupinda mune wekutanga nekukuvara. Chicken Inn yakakuanda 1-0 mumutambo iwoyu asi muteveri wenhabvu, VaLesvison Ndudzi, vanoti ikozvino maGamecocks anofanira kungwarira Billiart Vachitarisa matambiro akaita maGamecocks mumutambo wekutanga, muongorori wezvemitambo ane mukurumbira, VaAndrew Rwodzi, vanoti havasi kunyanyotyira Chicken Inn. Vatsigiri vechikwata cheHighlanders vanogara muSouth Africa vanosvika zviuru zviviri vavimbisa kuti vachange vari munhandare vachikuzirira Chicken Inn. Chimwe chikwata chemuZimbabwe cheHarare City chiri kuMadagascar uko chiri kusangana neAS Adema kwete muCaf Champions League, asi muCaf Confederation Cup. Harare City iri kutingamira 3-2 kubva mumutambo wekutanga zvekuti murairidzi wechikwata ichi, Taurai Mangwiro, anoti haasi kuona vachinetseka kukunda mumutambo wechipiri uyu. Mutambo wekugumisira uchange uri muRufaro Stadium umo Dynamos iri kusangana neZPC Kariba mumutambo wekota fainari yeZimbabwe National Army Charity Challenge. Kunyange hazvo mune manyukunyuku muchikwata ichi, chikwata ichi change chichingotamba mumutambo wehushamwari zvekuti uyu ndiwo mutambo ucharatudza kusimba kwacho. Mutambo uyu wauya mumusha macho musina kumira zvakanaka mushure mekunge murairdzi wacho, Jorge Silva wekuBrazil, nezuro akarova mutori wemifananidzo yepaterevhizheni yeZimbabwe Braodcasting Corporation. Svondo rapera, Silva zvekare akakandirana makobvu nematete nemurairdzi wevabati vepagedhe wechikwata ichi, Gif Muzadzi, izvo zvave kuitisa mibvunzo mumabatiro ebasa rake. Asi vatsigiri venhabvu vari kutarisira kuti chikwata cheChicken Inn pamwe necheHarare City zvichavasiya vachipemberera pachapera mitambo yavo.

headline: FC Platinum Yokurudzirwa Kukunda Mitambo yepaMusha Kuti Ibudirire muMakwikwi eCaf Champions League
text: Chikwata cheFC Platinum chirikuvhura makundano enhabvu egore rino asi paine mibvunzo. Vanotevera mutambo wenhabvu havasi kugutsikana nematambiro arikuita FC Platinum pamusha payo mumitambo yeCaf Champions League vakatarisana nemutambo mukuru neOrlando Pirates yekuSouth Africa iyo yakatora mukombe uyu muna 1995. Nhoroondo yenhabvu muAfrica inotaura kuti zvikwata zvinokunda nemutsindo pamusha ndizvo zvinowanzoenderera mberi nemakundano asi matambiro eKugona Kunenge Kudada muMandava Stadium asimudza mibvunzo mumukana wavo wekusvika kuma kota fainari. FC Platinum yakatatarika zvinotyisa neCnaps yekuMadagascar ndokuzokunda 1-0 mumutambo uyo vaitarisirwa kukanda zvibodzwa pamadiro, ndokuzoita zvekare mangange 0-0 ne Otoyo Oho yekuCongo. Muteveri wenhabvu VaFrancis Mwendamberi vanoti Kugona Kunenge Kudada inofanira kuwedzera mwando pamatambiro ayo pamusha kana ichida kubudirira mumakwikwi aya. Pamusoro peOrlando Pirates, FC Platinum iri mugungano rimwechete ne Esperance yekuTunisia iyo ine mukombe uyu pamwe ne Horoya yeku Guinea. Zvikwata zviviri zvinopedza zviri pamusoro mugungano iri ndizvo zvinoenderera mberi nemakwikwi aya. Muteveri wechikwata cheDynamos VaObert Masvotore vanoti FC Platinum isatarise mazita kana mukurumbira une zvikwata zvavari kusangana nazvo. Mumwe muteveri wemutambo uyu VaTatenda Makazhu ndivo vanofunga kuti Kugona Kunenge Kudada inokwanisa kusvika mufainari yemakundano aya. Asi murairidzi wePirates Milutin Sredojevic audza mapepanhau ekuSouth Africa kuti ari kutya kutamba nechikwata cheFC Platinum nenyaya yekuti chikwata chitsva mumakundano aya uye ati anoremekedza murairidzi wacho Norman Mapeza zvakanyanya. Ati sezvo Pirates iri kutamba neFC Platinum mumutambo wekutanga kuMandava Stadium kuZvishavane, zvinonetsa zvikuru kuenda iko nemugwagwa. Asi Pirates iri kubheja kuti inosimudza mukomb weChampions League kechipiri munhoroondo yayo. Asi FC Platinum ichange isina mutambi akatamba zvinonwisa mvura mwaka uno kana kuti Soccer Star of the Year, Rodwell Chinyengetere, uyo ave kuenda kunotambira Baroka FC ku South Africa naWinston Mhango uyo arikuenda kuSouth Africa zvekare. Kugona Kuenge Kudada irikutarisira kusvika kana kudarika chidanho chakasvikwa neDynamos iyo yakasvika mufainari yeCaf Champions League muna 1998 nemuma semi finari muna 2008.
