headline: ‘Squad yakanaka asi. . .’
text: SHASHA dzakambonetsa dzichitambira maWarriors pamwe nevaongorori vemutambo uyu vanoti chikwata chaSunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa icho chakasarudzwa kuti chinomirira nyika kumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations chakanaka kunyangwe zvazvo vamwe vatambi vakaita saWillard Katsande naCosta Nhamoinesu vaifanira kuvewo muchikwata ichi.   Svondo rino, Mhofu akadoma vatambi 34 avo vachapinda mukembi umo vachatanga gadziriro dzekuenda kumakwishu aya. Mutambo uyu uri kutanga nemusi wa11 Chikumi apo Zimbabwe ichatamba neEgypt, kuCairo.   Lazarus Muhoni – uyo akanwisa chibodzwa chakaendesa maWarriors kumakwishu ekutanga eAFCON mugore ra2004 kuTunisia – anoti chikwata ichi chakanakisa zvikuru asi Mhofu angadai akashevedzawo Katsande sezvo ruzivo rwake rwenhabvu rwaizobatsira zvikuru mumutambo uyu.   Katsande ndiye aive kaputeni wemaWarriors kuAFCON yakaitirwa kuGabon uye kugumurwa kwakaita chikwata ichi akabva asendeka shangu dzake achiti anoda kupa vechidiki mukana wekuti vatambewo. Asi pakurwira kuenda kumakwishu egore rino, akamboshevedzwa kamwechete naChidzambwa apo maWarriors akaita mangange 1-1 neDemocratic Republic of Congo.   Muhoni anoti Katsande aigona kushanda basa guru pakumaka Mohamed Salah weEgypt zvekuti aimushaisa mukana wekuita zvidobi-dobi zvake apo zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichasangana.   “Willard Katsande ange achidiwa muchikwata ichi nekuti ndiye ega kubva muZimbabwe akasimba bhonzo uye ane ruzivo rwemutambo uyu sezvo akamboenda kuAFCON kare. Mwedzi yadarika, ange achitamba zvinonwisa mvura kuKaizer Chiefs kwake kuSouth Africa saka anokodzera kuve ari muchikwata ichi. Apa tichitarisa mitambo hedu, haina kuchipa nekuti tiri kusangana neshasha chaidzo dzakaita saMohamed Salah. Katsande ndipo paaigona kushanda basa guru kumunyararidza nekuti Katsande haakusiye uchienda,” anodaro.   Anoti vamwe vatambi vari muchikwata ichi vakaita saThabani Kamusoko naDanny Phiri – avo vakasarudzwa kuti vatambe pachinzvimbo chaKatsande – vanogona kubata basa sebasa.   “Asi tichitarisa hedu vamwe vatambi varimo vanofadza zvavo vakaita saThabani Kamusoko uyo ari kutambira kuDRC kana Danny Phiri. Kamusoko ini ndinomufarira, kuDRC ange achitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura uye muviri wake mukuru ndewenhabvu chaiwo. Zvikwata zvatinenge tichisangana nazvo zvine vatambi vakuru saka tinofanirwawo kuita vedu vakakura kuti zvitibatsire pakuhwina mabhora,” anodaro Muhoni.   Shasha yekuongorora nhabvu Charles “CNN” Mabika anorumbidza chikwata ichi achiti chakagona kubatanidzwa sezvo chiine vechidiki pamwe nevamwe vave nenguva ndefu vachitamba.   Asi, anoti Mhofu angadai akashevedza Nhamoinesu anove mumwe wevatambi vemaWarriors vakuru vane ruzivo rwakanyanya rwenhabvu sezvo ave nemakore akawanda achitambira kuEurope.   Masvondo adarika, Nhamoinesu akabuda pachena kuti asendeka kutambira maWarriors, asi Mabika anoti Mhofu aifanirwa kugara pasi naye omuudza kuti anoda kumutambisa nekuda kweruzivo rwake rwaanarwo rwenhabvu.   “Chikwata chakabatana nekuti chine vechidiki nevakuru, zvinove zvatinoda asi Costa Nhamoinesu ange achidiwa. Nhamoinesu anodirwa ruzivo rwake uye rwaishanda apa nekuti mitambo yedu haina kuchipa. Ndiye wandinoona aigona kudzikamisa vechidiki munhandare kana chabvondoka,” anodaro Mabika.   Aimbove mubati wepagedhi wemaWarriors neDynamos, Japhet ‘ShortCat’ Mparutsa anoti nguva ino ndiyo yekuvaka chikwata chemaWarriors chichazonetsa makore mashanu kana gumi anotevera.   “Tinofanirwa kutarira kumberi kune remangwana redu, tovaka chikwata icho chichatibatira basa kwemakore mashanu kusvika gumi anotevera.   “Dai ndirini ndiri panyanga, ndaitumira vechidiki vane makore ari pasi pe20 ne23 okuberekwa, tovasanganisa nevashanu kana vatanhatu vagara vachitamba muchikwata ichi kuti vabatsire vechidiki avo vanenge vasarudzwa,” anodaro ShortCat.

headline: Jordan Zemura anotambira mari shoma
text: MUTAMBI wenhabvu weAFC Bournemouth nemaWarriors eZimbabwe – Jordan Zemura (22) – ndiye ari kutambira mari shoma kuchikwata chake mwaka uno apo chiri kukwikwidza muEnglish Premier League.   Mutsvakurudzo, zvaonekwa kuti Zemura, uyo akasaina chibvumirano chake kuBournemouth achiri kutambira chikwata chevadiki, anotambira mari inosvika £385 pasvondo.   Mari yaanotambira iyi yakaderera zvikuru kana ichienzaniswa nevamwe vatambi vemuchikwata chake vakadai saJefferson Lerma uyo anotambira mari inosvika £55 000 pasvondo.   Tichitarisa mari inotambirwa naZemura, zvinoreva kuti pamwedzi anotambira £1 432 uye mwaka wose achitambira £17 184.   Mari yaanotambira mwaka wose haisvike pane inotambirwa naLerma yepasvondo rimwe chete.   Muchikwata ichi zvekare, vamwe vatambi vakadai saDominic Solanke vanonzi vanotambira mari inosvika £50 000 pasvondo, kuchiti Phillip naLewis Cook vanotambira £40 000 pasvondo pamumwe nemumwe wavo.    Mari dzinotambirwa nevatambi veBournemouth – (spotrac.com)   Asi pane tarisiro yekuti Bournemouth ichatanga kuita hurukuro naZemura munguva inotevera kuti iwedzere kondirakiti yake iyo inotarisirwa kupera gore rinotevera. Mutambi uyu ari kutarisirwa kutamba zvikuru mwaka uno sezvo achidiwa zvakanyanya naScott Parker uyo aimushandisa mwaka wadarika apo vakahwina tikiti rekupinda muEPL.

headline: MaChevrons ofara
text: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chigere mudenga rechinomwe zvichitevera kukunda kwachakaita cheBangladesh mumitambo yeTwenty20 International Series (T20) pamwe chete neyeOne Day International (ODI).   MaChevrons ange aine makore anodarika mapfumbamwe asati ambokunda Bangladesh mumitambo yeODI, izvo akazoita svondo radarika apo akahwina mitambo miviri yavakatamba ndokuhwina series iyi vaine mumwe mutambo usati watambwa.   Mumitambo mitatu yeT20 yakatambwa nezvikwata zviviri izvi, maChevrons akahwina miviri, Bangladesh ndokuhwina mumwe chete kuchiti yeODI yatambwa kusvika pari zvino, maChevrons ahwina miviri (wechitatu wakatambwa bepa rino richitodhindwa).   Pamitambo iyi, mutambi wemaChevrons, Sikandar Raza ange achitamba seakasvikirwa izvo zvakamuona achitamba cricket inonwisa mvura ndokubatsira maChevrons kuhwina. Anotungamira maChevrons, Regis Chakabva anoti kuhwina kwavakaita kwakaunza mufaro mukuru kuchikwata chavo pamwe nevatsigiri sezvo nguva yange yareba vasati vambokunda Bangladesh.   Anoti kushandura kwavakaita matambiro chimwe chezvikonzero zvakabatsira kuti vahwine mutambo uyu. “Nguva yange yareba tichitatarika kukunda Bangladesh asi tadzoka, ndinoona kunge kushandura matambiro kwatakaita ndiko kumwe kwakabatsira kuti tinge tiri patiri nhasi, tichitamba mhando yecricket yepamusoro.   “Asi nguva pfupi yadarika tange tichibata mhando yecricket yepamusoro, uye Sikandar Raza semitambo yadarika, ange achitamba cricket zvinonwisa mvura. “Tinovimba kuti tikaramba takadaro tinoenda mberi tichisimukira sechikwata,” akadaro Chakabva.   Vatsigiri vecricket vamwe vange vachiti kudzorwa kwakaita Dave Houghton kuzorairidza maChevrons ndiko kumwe kwakabatsira kushandura matambiro emaChevrons ayo ange achingohwina mitambo yose yaange achitamba kunze kwemumwe weT20i uyo vakakundwa neBangladesh asi vakazohwina mutambo wose sezvo pamitambo mitatu maChevrons akakunda pamiviri.

headline: ‘Mabhinya’ ava kuda Graham Potter
text: CHIKWATA chenhabvu chekuEngland, cheChelsea chinonzi chiri kuita hurukuro nemurairidzi weBrighton & Hove – Graham Potter – uyo wavanoda kuti agotsiva Thomas Tuchel zvichitevera kudzingwa basa kwaakaitwa nezuro.   Varairidzi vakawanda vanosanganisira Zinedine Zidane naMauricio Pochettino vange vachifungidzirwa kuti vanogona kutsiva Tuchel sevarairidzi ve”Chele” kana kuti “Mabhinya”, asi pane mashoko anoti Potter ndiye ari kudiwa neChelsea.   Chikwata cheBrighton & Hove chakatopa Potter mvumo yekuti akurukure neMabhinya uye zvikafamba zvakanaka, anotarisirwa kunge akagara pabhenji reChelsea svondo rino apo ichasangana neFulham.   Kana Chelsea ikaita chibvumirano naPotter, inotarisirwa kubhadhara mari inosvika 12 miriyoni paunzi yekumutenga kubva kuBrighton.

headline: Vatambi vaita ngura: Siyachitema
text: MURAIRIDZI wechikwata chenetball cheGlow Petroleum Queens – Perpetau Siyachitema – anoti kugara nguva refu vatambi vemutambo uyu vakangogara kwava kuona vazhinji vachiusiya, kuita ngura kana kutsvaga mamwe mabasa anovararamisa.   Kubva pakatanga kumiswa mitambo gore radarika nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, mutambo wenetball hauna kuzombopihwa mvumo yekutambwa zvekare izvo sekutaura kwaSiyachitema, zvava kuita kuti vamwe vatambi vaore moyo vachifunga kuti mutambo uyu hauchdzoke uye vamwe vave kuita mamwe mabasa kana zvedzimba.   “Denda iri chokwadi rakanganisa zvakawanda chaizvo nekuti vatambi vazhinji havachina shungu nemutambo uyu nekuti havachazive kuti uchadzoka here kana kuti kwete.   “Kubva gore radarika taingoita gadziriro vamwe vari kudzimba dzavo, zvino munhu anosvika pakuneta nekungoita gadziriro dzake mutambo usingadzoke.   Kuburikidza nekugara ikoko, vamwe vave kusimba miviri yavo, vamwe vave kuita pamuviri zvekuti kuzotamba netball kunozonetsa pamberi apo. “Kudai denda iri rachipera kuitira kuti upenyu hwedu nevatambi huchiendekawo nekuti ndipo panoraramira vatambi vazhinji,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Shasha iyi inoti iri kuzvishingisa ndokuudza vatambi vake kuti vasaore moyo uye vagare vachiita gadziriro dzavo kuitira kuti miviri yavo igare yakasimba.   “Pakatanga Covid-19 gore radarika, vatambi vaiita gadziriro vari kudzimba dzavo uye mazuva ose ndaigadzira mavhidhiyo ndovatumira ezvandinenge ndichida kuti vadzidze ivo vozonditumira vachizviita, asi vamwe vakasvika pakuneta nekuti vanenge vave kubvunza kuti toramba tichifondokerei iwo mutambo wacho usiri kudzoka. Vanenge vachitoti zviri nani kuita zvimwe.   “Ini semurairidzi wavo, handikwanise kuvaudza izvozvo kuti zororai, ndinongovati garai muchingoita gadziriro kusvika pazvinenge zvakanaka, hapana anoziva kuti zvinonaka rinhi,” anodaro.   Siyachitema ndiye akatungamira chikwata chemaGems chekutanga kuenda kunokwikwidza kumitambo yeWorld Cup 2019 apo chakanokwikwidza kuEngland uye kubva kumutambo uyu, akasvika achisendeka shangu dzake dzekutamba ndokutanga kurairidza mutambo uyu.   Chikwata chemaGems gore rinotevera chinofanirwa kutanga kurwira kuenda kumutambo we2023 World Cup uyo unofanirwa kuzotambirwa kuSouth Africa.   Achitaura, Siyachitema anoti kana netball ikasapihwa mvumo yekuti ichitanga kutambwa, zvinogona kuremera chikwata chemaGems gore rinotevera kusarudza vatambi vanochimirira pakurwira tikiti rekuenda kuSouth Africa sezvo vatambi vazhinji vanenge vava nengura yekugara vasingatambe kwenguva refu.   “Zvino zvino takatarisana nekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup, zvino kana tisiri kutamba zvinogona kuzoremera chikwata chenyika.   “Mitambo iri kutofanirwa kutanga kutambwa nekuchimbidza kuti vatambi vagare vakagwinya uye vanosarudza chikwata chenyika vatange kuongorora vatambi. Patakabva kuWorld Cup yekupedzisira, vatambi vakaita seni, Pauline Jani naJoice Takaidza takabva tasendeka kutambira maGems, saka pane gwanza guru rinofanira kuvharwa.   Kana mitambo isiri kutambwa hameno kuti vanotitsiva sei,” anodaro Siyachitema.

headline: PANE NYAYA: MAFERO . . .uku ndiri kumaWarriors, Chicken Inn
text: MURAIRIDZI weChicken Inn nechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors Joey “Mafero” Antipas anoti mabasa maviri aya ari kumupedza simba, asi acharamba achishingirira kuti agobudirira maari ose.   Mafero anoti anoda kutora mukombe weCastle Premiership kechipiri munhorowondo yeGamecocks – sezita remadunhurirwa reChicken Inn.   Muchinda uyu akambofanogadzwa kuve murairidzi wemaWarriors nesangano reZifa apo kondirakiti yake ichapera musi wa31 Zvita.   “Zvinhu zvakaoma kuita mabasa maviri, kurairidza Chicken Inn muligi kozoti maWarriors chikwata chenyika. Zvakaoma asi unofanirwa kushanduka nekuchimbidza paunenge wave kuenda kune rimwe basa.   “Zviri kundipedza simba rakawanda asi ndinoramba ndichishanda nesimba nekuti ndiri kuda chaizvo kubudirira mumabasa maviri ese aya,” anodaro Mafero.   Parizvino Chicken Inn iri pechipiri palog ichitevera CAPS United.   Nerimwewo divi, Mafero mumasvondo anotevera achange achitungamira maWarriors apo achatanga kurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwishu e2021 Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ayo achazoitirwa kuCameroon.   Sezvo kondirakiti yake ichapera musi wa31 Zvita, Mafero anoti haasati aziva kuti acharamba ari panyanga here.   “Parizvino ndichiri kumboshanda, tichagara pasi tozokurukura toona kuti zvichafambiswa sei,” anodaro Mafero

headline: MaChevrons hutu kuAustralia
text: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chakaenda kuAustralia uko chichabandana nemaAussies mumitambo mitatu yeOne Day International yeSuper League yekurwira kuenda kuInternational Cricket Council (ICC) World Cup India 2023.   Zvichitevera kupera kwakaita mutambo wemaChevrons neIndia weODI uyo chikwata chemuno chakakundwa “whitewash”, akabva atonanga kuAustralia kunorwira zvibodzwa zvekuenda kuWorld Cup.   MaChevrons neAustralia achatamba mitambo mitatu kutanga nemusi weSvondo apo wechipiri uchizotambwa svondo rinotevera musi weChitatu uye wekupedzisira uchatambwa musi wa3 Gunyana.   Muchinyorwa chakabva kuZimbabwe Cricket (ZC), mukushi wemashoko weZC, Darlington Majonga anoti mutambo uyu wakakosha zvikuru kumaChevrons.   Anoti kana chikwata chenyika chakahwinha mutambo uyu zvibodzwa zvavo zvinoramba zvichiwedzera izvo zvinozovabatsira kubudirira murwendo rwekuenda kuWorld Cup vasingazotambiswe mimwe mitambo.   “Mutambo uyu ndewezvikwata 13 wekurwira kuenda kuICC Men’s Cricket World Cup 2023 iyo ichatambirwa kuIndia,” anodaro.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chakaenda nemutambi wacho Blessing Muzarabani uyo akakundikana kutamba neIndia sezvo ainge akakuvara.   Zvisinei, maChevrons achange asina vamwe vatambi vakakosha vanosanganisira Craig Ervine, Tendai Chatara, Wellington Masakadza naMilton Shumba.    Lady Chevrons   Kuchitiwo nerimwe divi, chikwata chemaLady Chevrons chiri kusangana necheSouth Africa cheEmerging Women Team apo chiri kuita gadziriro dzekuenda kuUnited Arab Emirates kumitambo yekurwira kuenda kuICC Women’s T20 World Cup.   ZC yakaumba chikwata chevatambi 15 avo yakatakura kuenda navo kuSouth Africa.   MaLady Chevrons neSouth Africa vachasangana muzuva anoti 28, 29, 31 Nyamavhuvhu uye 2 na3 Gunyana.

headline: Zvikwata zveNhabvu Zvotsvaga Vatambi Vatsva
text: Zvikwata zvenhavu yepamusoro yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League zvapinda mubishi rekutsvaga vatambi vatsva vakatarisana nekusimbisa zvikwata zvavo zvemwaka unotevera. Chiri kunyanyonakidza ndechekuti vatambi vane zvikwata zvakabuda muPremier Soccer League nemhaka yekukundikana ndivo vaita mukurumbira wekurwirwa nezvikwata izvi mushure mekuita zvidavado apo zvikwata zvavo zvaive muPSL. Vatambi vakaita saKing Nadolo weTelOne, Denver Mukamba weChapungu,Nomore Chinyerere weHwange naClive Dzingai weMushowani Stars, ndivo vari pamuromo pezvikwata zvizhinji, Nadolo achinzi arikudiwa neDynamos, FC Platinum, pamwe neNgezi Platinum Stars. Asi Ngezi haiisi kugumira panaNadolo chete zvichinzi izvo irikuedza zvekare kuraura Denver Mukamba kubva kuChapungu. Murairidzi weMadamburo, Rodwell Dhlakama haana kuvanza kuti anofarira matambiro aMukamba asi achiwedzera iye kuti mutambi uyu anofanira kushandura maitiro ake kana achida kutambira chikwata ichi. Mukamba ane mbiri yekudhakwa uyezve yekurovha basa kuzvikwata zvese zvaatambira zvinosanganisirawo Caps United ne Dynamos. Dynamos yacho yapindawo mumusha weTriangle umo varikuita hurukuro nechikwata ichi kuti vatenge Donald Dzingayi pamusoro paRalph Matema uyo varikuda kutora kuYadah. Mubati wehomwe weDembare VaWebster Marechera vanoti vapa murairidzi wavo Tonderai Ndiraya cheki yakavhurika kuti atenge vatambi vaanoda kuti chikwata chake chisimbe. Ndiraya pachake arikubvuma kuti chikwata ichi chinoda kugadziriswa zvakasimba achiti iye arikuda vatambi vanokodzera kutambira chikwata chinonzi Dembare. Kunyange hazvo FC Platinum yakatora mukombe weligi, chikwata ichi hachisi kumira mukutsvaga vamwe vatambi. Arikurairidza FC Platinum parizvino Lizwe Sweswe anoti hapana zvakawanda zvirikuda kugadziriswa paKugona Kunenge Kudada kunze kwevatambi vashoma shoma. Mashoko arikufamba achiti iwo Kugona Kunenge Kudada yatobvumirana naRalph Kawondera kuti asiye basa kuTriangle anange kuZvishavane. Muchato pakati paKawondera neTriangle wekutambire maSugar Sugar Boys uikupera musi wa 31 Zvita. Pamusoro pezvo, Kugona Kunenge Kudada irikunakidzwa nevatambi vekuHwange uko varikuita hurukuro yekuda kutenga Nomore Chinyere mushure mekuraurako Gift Bweti mukupewa kwemwaka wa 2018. Asi Platinum haisati yabudirira pana Chinyere uyo arikudiwawo zvekare neChicken Inn, iyo irikuda mukombe weligi uyu mushure mekupedza iri pachinhanho chechipiri mwaka uno. MaGame Cocks arikuedza zvekare kuti vatore Clive Dzingayi uyo airura mumusha weMushowani Stars. Asi mumusha weCaps United mune runyararo zvichinzi izvo Makepekepe arikufarira vatambi vari munhabvu yepasi yeDivision One pane vatambi vemuPremier Soccer League, vakawanda vacho vanotsvaga zvikwata zvitswa pese panopera mwaka. Asi Highlanders ndiyo yarasikirwa zvakanyanya panguva ino mushure mekunge murairidzi wavo Henrik Piete De Jong asiya basa akananga kuFC Platinum. Izvi zvauya pamusoro pemutambi Prince Dube uyo arikuChina uko arikutsvaga chikwata chitsva chekutambira mwaka unotevera. Makwikwi eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League arikutanga muna Kurume nemutambo weChampion of Champions pakati peFC Platinum neHighlanders. No media source currently available

headline: Morocco yatevera Senegal ku’Round of 16′
text: MOROCCO nhasi manheru ano yatevera Senegal panyika dzemuAfrica kupinda mu’Round of 16′ zvichitevera kukunda kwayaita Canada 2-1 mumutambo we2022 FIFA World Cup iyo iri kutambirwa kuQatar.   MaAtlas Lions ange ari muGroup F umo akasangana neCroatian, Belgium neCanada.   Mumutambo wekutanga, Morocco yakaita mangange 0-0 neCroatia, ndokuzokunda Belgium 2-0 uye Canada iyo yayaradzika 2-1 ndokupedza iine zvibodzwa zvipfumbabwe.   Yabva yaita nhoroondo yekupedza iri pamusoro peGroup F ndokubva yanyora nhoroondo yekuita chikwata chega chemuAfrica chekupedza chiri pamusoro muboka rayo uye chisina kumbokundwa mumitambo kana mumwe chete.   Iye zvino MaAtlas Lions amirira kuona kuti achasangana nechikwata chipi kuRound of 16.

headline: Mbappe haasi kuzouya: Guardiola
text: anoramba mashoko ekuti chikwata chake chiri kuda kubhadhara mari inosvika 200 miriyoni paunzi kuti chitenge mutambi weParis Saint-Germain, Kylian Mbappe, muna Ndira wegore rinotevera.   Zvakabuda mumapepanhau kuti City ichada kuendera mutambi uyu wekuFrance, uye PSG ichidawo kutengesa vatambi kuti mabhuku ayo azadzikise zvinodiwa nemitemo yefinancial fair play.   Asi, zviri kunzi Guardiola kuti atenge mutambi uyu, chikwata chake chinofanirwa kutanga chatengesa mumwe mutambi nekuda kwemitemo iyi uye Raheem Sterling ndiye ari kutaurwa kunzi anogona kutengeswa.   Achitaura svondo rino – vasati vasangana neHoffenheim mumutambo weChampions League – Guardiola akaudza vatori venhau kuti hapana apo chikwata chake pachichaendera mutambi uyu uyo akahwina mukombe weWorld Cup.   “Hazvisi kuzoitika,” anodaro.   “Dzimwe dzenguva handinzwisise kuti nyaya idzi dziri kubva kupi chaizvo.” – Sportsmail Football

headline: Zvidzidzo zvesoftball zvoitwa
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Softball Association rakapihwa chiremerera chekuitisa zvidzidzo zvekuvandudza ruzivo rwevarairidzi, varidzi vepembe pamwe nevanochetedza zvibodzwa zvemutambo uyu neWorld Baseball Softball Confederation (WBSC).Zvidzidzo izvi zvichange zviri zveLevel One International izvo zvichavabatsira kuti vagokwanisa kuenda kunorairidza nekunoridza pembe kune dzimwe nyika uye zvichaitwa muna Kukadzi.   Varairidzi vanosvika 50 vemutambo uyu, varidzi vepembe 20 uye vanotora zvibodzwa 20 vari kutarisirwa kuzobatsirikana nezvidzidzo izvi.   Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Softball Association, Stonard Mapfumo, anoti sangano reWBSC richatumira nhengo ina idzo dzichauya kuzoitisa zvidzidzo izvi.   “Takatambira nemufaro mukuru danho iri, takarongerwa neWorld Baseball Softball Confederation kuti tiwedzere magwaro ebasa epamusoro kune varairidzi vesoftball, varidzi vepembe nevanonyora zvibodzwa vemuno.   “Izvi zvichatibatsira mune ramangwana apo tiri kurwisa chaizvo kuti mutambo uyu ukure uye usvike kure. Kuchauya nhengo ina muno dziri kutumirwa neWBSC kuzoitisa zvidzidzo izvi mwedzi unotevera,” anodaro Mapfumo.   Zvidzidzo izvi zvaifanirwa kunge zvichiitwa kutanga musi wa7 Kukadzi zvichizopera musi wa9 asi zvave kuitwa  musi wa23 Kukadzi zvichizopera musi wa26 sezvo nhengo idzi dzichatanga dzambotenderera kune dzimwe nyika dzichidzidzisako.   Mapfumo anoti zvidzidzo izvi zvauya panguva yakanaka apo sangano ravo riri kuita gadziriro dzechikwata chemadzimai chichanokwikwidza kumutambo weAfrica/Europe Olympic Qualifier uyo uchaitirwa kuPretoria, kuSouth Africa muna Chivabvu.   “Zvabva zvatinakira nekuti tange tiri kugadzirira chikwata chedu icho tinoda kuzotumira kuPretoria muna Chivabvu kunokwikwidza kumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuTokyo, kuJapan kumutambo we2020 Olympic Games.   “Saka varairidzi vedu vakadzidziswa vopihwa ruzivo rwepamusoro rwesoftball ndinoona tichisvika kure,” anodaro Mapfumo.

headline: Tanganda Half Marathon yoitwa
text: KUCHANGE kusingadanwe anonzwa svondo rino kwaMutare uko shangwaiti dzekumhanya, kusanganisira dzinotarisirwa kubva kunyika dzekunze dzakadai seSpain, dzichakwikwidza mumujaho weAnnual Tanganda Half Marathon.   Shasha dzemarathon dzinodarika 700 dziri kutarisirwa kukwikwidza mumujaho wegore rino uye dzinosanganisira Misheck Sithole – uyo akahwina mujaho wevarume naRudo Mhonderwa akahwina kuvanhukdzi gore radarika.   Operations manager wekambani yeTanganda Tea, iyo iri kukotsvera mujaho uyu – Farai Garayi – anoti vari kutarisira dzimwe shasha dzekumhanya dzichabva kunze kwenyika.   “Gore rega rega tiri kugara tichitambira nhare kubva kunze kwenyika dzeshasha dzinomhanya marathon dzinoda kuuya kuzokwikwidza mumujaho uyu. Izvi zviri kurakidza kuti mujaho uyu uri kukura uye unofarirwa zvikuru.   “Saka isu sekambani tinovimbisa kuti makore anotevera ticharamba tichingoronga mujaho uyu,” anodaro Garayi.   Anoti gore rino kuri kuuya shangwiti dzemarathon dziri kubva kuSpain kuzokwikwidza mumujaho uyu.   “Kutaura kwandiri kuita kuno uku pane vanomhanya vekuSpain vakatonyoresa kuti vari kuuya kuzokwikwidza mumujaho uyu, zvinorakidza kuti wave mukuru uye unoteverwa pasi rose,” anodaro.   Shasha yemujaho wewiricheya Edmund Makutya – uyo anove kaputeni weTeam Zimbabwe – anoti mujaho weTanganda Half Marathon wakakosha chaizvo sezvo uchivabatsira mukuita gadziriro dzavo apo vanozoenda kunokwikwidza kunze kwenyika.   “Mujaho uyu wakatinakira isu nekuti tinogara tichienda kunokwikwidza kunze kwenyika saka tinoushandisa kuita gadziriro dzedu ndosaka tichiukoshesa uye tichienda gore negore kunokwikwidza,” anodaro Makutya.   Mujaho uyu wakareba makiromita 21 uye unomhanywa muMvuma road uchizoperera paMutare Sports Club.

headline: MaSoccer star aripi?. . . vamwe votambura, vamwe zviri kufaya
text: KUPERA kwemwaka wega-wega wenhabvu makore ese kunopihwa mubairo weSoccer Star of the Year kumutambi anenge atamba zvinonwisa mvura kudarika vamwe vose.   Vatambi vakagashidzwa mubairo uyu vanosanganisira George Shaya, Shacy Tauro, Moses Chunga, Peter Ndlovu, Wilfried Mugeyi naAgent Sawu uye vamwe vachingobva kuhwina mubairo uyu vakabva vawana mukana wekuenda kunotambira kunze kwenyika.   Asi makore adarika, vamwe vatambi vakahwina mubairo uyu vakakundikana kusvika kure mumutambo uyu. Mubvunzo unouya pakadai ndewekuti saka vanosarudza mutambi anozogachidzwa mubairo uyu vanovhotera mutambi chaiye here kana kuti kungosarudza wavanenge vachida?   Ongororo kubva mugore ra2010, inotaridza kuti vatambi vanoti Charles Sibanda (2010), Washington Arubi (2011), Denver Mukamba (2012), Tawanda Muparati (2013), Dennis Dauda (2014), Danny Phiri (2015), Hardlife Zvirekwi (2016) naRodwell Chingetere (2017) vakahwina mubairo uyu.   Pavatambi ava, vatatu chete vanoti Arubi, Mukamba naPhiri ndivo vakakwanisa kutengwa nezvikwata zvekuSouth Africa, asi Mukamba akadzoka mushure mekanguva kadiki. Charles Sibanda (2010)

headline: Tinogona kutora ‘coach’ wekunze: ZIFA
text: SANGANO rinotungamirira nhabvu yemuno reZimbabwe Football Association (ZIFA) rinoti rinogona kugadza mumwezve murairidzi wechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors wekunze kana wemuno kuti agotsiva Zdrvako “Loga” Logarusic uyo akadzingwa basa kutanga kwesvondo rino.   Zvichitevera kudzinga kwavakaita Loga basa, ZIFA iri pakati pekutsvaga murairidzi wekutsiva chizvarwa chekunyika yeCroatia ichi, icho chakakwanisa kurairidza mitambo 14 chete yemaWarriors ndokuhwinha mumwe chete.   Pari zvino ZIFA ichambogadza murairidzi anongofanobata chigaro ichi kwekanguva kadiki uyo vachapa basa rekutungamira maWarriors mumitambo yemwedzi unotevera apo achange achirwirira tikiti rekuenda kuQatar World Cup. Mutungamiriri weZifa – Felton Kamambo – anoti ZIFA yatanga basa rekutsvaga murairidzi anotsiva Loga.   “Zvichitevera kupesana kwatakaita naLoga, veruzhinji vangade kuziva kuti tinogona kugadza mumwe murairidzi wemaWarriors anove chizvarwa chekunze kwenyika asi hunge kana ane magwaro akakwana uye akatifadza patinoita hurukuro naye.   “Iye zvino tave kushambadza basa iri tichitsvaga murairidzi mutsva anouya kuzotungamira chikwata chedu. “Saka basa iri tinogona kungopa chero murairidzi, angave wemuno kana wekunze anenge atifadza ane zvatiri kutsvaga ndiye achapinda panyanga,” anodaro Kamambo.   ZIFA yainge yambovimbisa kuzivisa murairidzi achafanobata chigaro ichi musi weChipiri svondo rino usati wadarika asi haina kuzoita saizvozvo.   Mumitambo 14 iyo Loga akarairidza maWarriors, akangokwanisa kuhwina mumwe chete, ndokuita mangange mishanu uye ndokukundwa misere.   Zvisinei, asiya maWarriors abudirira kuenda kumitambo yeAfrica Cup of Nations iyo ichatambwa gore rinotevera kuCameroon. Asi, asiyawo chikwata chenyika ichi chiri pasi muGroup G murwendo rwekurwira kuenda ku2022 Qatar World Cup apo chiine chibodzwa chimwe chete kubva mumitambo miviri yachatamba kusvika pari zvino.   Mwedzi unotevera, maWarriors achasangana neGhana mumitambo miviri yakatevedzena yekurwira kuenda kuQatar iyo vanofanirwa kuhwina kuti varambe vaine mukana.

headline: Mitambo yePremier Soccer League Yopinda Muvhiki reChinomwe Dynamos Ichinzi Isaite Mhirizhonga
text: Mhuri yenhabvu irikutarisira mitambo isina mhirizhonga apo makwikwi eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League ari kupinda musvondo rechinomwe. Mhuri yenhabvu munyika haisati yakanganwa mhirizhonga yakaitika svondo rapera apo vatsigiri veDynamos vakamuka chibhebhenenga mushure mekunge chikwata chavo chadamburwa 1-0 neFC Platinum vachitarisira kuti izvi hazvidzokororwe apo chikwata ichi chakananga kuBulawayo kunosangana neTsholotsho Pirates. Makwikwi eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League arikupinda musvondo rechinomwe apo Dynamos yacho iripachinhanho chakaoma chegumi neshanu asi mumwe mutsigiri Dembare VaShepard Manatsa vanoti vamwe vavo vanofanira kubvuma kukundwa kana izvi zvaitika. Asi VaManatsa vanoti chishuwiro chavo nedechekuti vakunde Tsholotsho Pirates kuitira kuti varambe vari muhondo yekukwikwidza kutora mukombe uyu uyo vakatorerwa neChicken Inn gore rapera. Asi vanoongorora zvemutambo wenhabvu vanoti zvirikutarisirwa naVaManatsa angangove maroto sezvo chikwata chavo chiri kutatarika. Dynamos ikakundwa, inosaririra zvikuru pazvikwata zviri kutungamira sezvo FC Platinum iyo iripamusoro soro isiri kutemwa nemusoro nekuti irikusangana neBorder Strikers iyo isina kana poindi imwechete kana chibodzwa zvacho pamitambo mitanhatu yavatamba. Muteveri weFC Platinum VaTerrence Kuhuni vanoti varikufara zvikuru nematambiro arikuita chikwata chavo vachiti ivo vakatarisa zvimwe zvikwata varikuona kunge FC Platinumn iri pamberi mberi zvinotyisa. VaKuhuni vanoti havasi kumbotarisa zvemutambo weBorder Starikers vachiti ivo vakatokunda kare. Asi kugona kunenge Kudada haifanire kudherera Border Strikers sezvo zvikwata zvinenge zviri pakaoma kudai zvinowanzoita mashiripiti anenge asingatarisirwe neveruzhinji. FC Platinum ikakundwa inenge yapa mukana kuHighlanders iyo iripamusha neHarare City. Vemumusha weHarare City varikuzhamba sezvirikuitawo veDynamos zvekuti svondo rapera vaishevedzera kuti murairidzi wavo VaTaurayi Mangwiro vanofanira kusiiswa basa. Izvi zvakaramba kutambirwa nevanoisa mari kuchikwata ichi vekanzuru yeHarare, vatsigiri ava vave kushevedzera kuti chikwata chavo chinofanira kukunda. Mumwe wavo vari kuti Harare City inofanira kukunda ndiVaLawrence Chapata avo varikuchemera mapoinzi matatu. Chikwata chiri pachinhanho chechitatu cheCaps United chiri pamusha asi kwete muNational Sports Stadium. Chiri kunotambira kuRufaro Stadium sezvo nhandare yeNational Sports Stadium yakachengeterwa mutambo uripo pakati pemaYoung Warriors nemaUnder 20 eCameroon nesvondo. MaGreen Machine akadamburwa mumutambo wavo wesvondo rapera 2-1 neHow Mine asi murairidzi wavo VaLloyd Chitembwe vanoti mutambo uyo yatove mvura yakaerera. Mumwe mutambo uripo ne Svondo uri pakati peChapungu neNgezi Platinum Stars Mitambo yese ye muHarare iri kutambwa neMugovera kupa mukana kumutambo wemaYoung Warriors nemaCameroon Cups we2017 Africa Youth Championships. Asi mune mamwe maguta, neSvondo mitambo iri ko ndeiyi. Mutare City Rovers ne Chicken Inn (Sakubva), Hwange ne How Mine (Colliery) and Highlanders v Harare City (Barbourfields) Nhengo yeWarriors Fan Club VaTendai Dzuwa vanoti veruzhinji vanofanira kuenda kuNational Sports Stadium kunokuza maYoung Warriors kuti akunde mumutambo wakakosha uyu. Chikwata chichakunda mumitambo miviri chichasangana neicho chichakundawo pamutambo weLibya neBenin munzira yekuenda kuma 2017 Africa Under 20 Championships. Makwikwi emuAfrica aya achaitirwa muZambia munaKubvumbi gore rinouya. Totarisa mutambo wekiriketi Masemi fainari e 2016 Associate Provincial League ari kubaka moto kuMasvingo neBindura apo zvikwat zvina zvasara mumakwikwi aya zvirikubandana. Chikwata cheSouthern Rocks chirikusangana neWestern Tigers kuMasvindo panguva imwecheteyo Centrals irikuratidzana masimba nePower Turbines kuBindura. Zvikwata zvichakunda mumitambo iyi zvirikusangana mufainari musi wa 28 Chivabvu. No media source currently available

headline: Simudzirai nhabvu yevechidiki’
text: ZVIKWATA zvenhabvu zvinokwikwidza muDivision One kana muPremier League zvokurudzirwa kuti zvikoshese vatambi vechidiki nechinangwa chekusimudzira matarenda avo kuti vagozove vatambi vemangwana.   Kurudziro iyi yakapihwa nasachigaro weNorthern Region Division One, Martin Kweza, achiti kuti nhabvu yemuno ibudirire zvakakosha kuti zvikwata zvipe mikana kune vechidiki.   Anoti kuNorthern Region, zvikwata zvose zvinokwikwidza vakazvitaurira kuti zvinofanirwa kuve zvine vatambi vashanu kana kudarika vane makore ari pasi pe18 ekuberekwa avo vavanoda kuona vachitamba masvondo ese.   Izvi, anodaro Kweza, zvinobatsira kuti nhabvu irambe ichikura pamwe nekuti vatambi ava vagofambira mberi mumutambo uyu.   Anoti kuwanza vatambi vechikuru muzvikwata hakubatsire sezvo zvichidzosera nhabvu kumashure uye nekushaisa vechidiki mikana yekusimukira mumutambo uyu.   “Donzvo redu isu kuvaka vatambi vechidiki kuti vasimukire vagotimirira vachienda kunotambira kunze kwenyika kune zvikwata zvakasiyana. Ndiko kusaka isu tichikurudzira zvikwata zvose zvinokwikwidza muNorthern Region kuti ngazvive nevatambi vashanu kana kudarika vane makore ari pasi pe18 ekuberekwa nekuti chatinoda kuona vechidiki vachivakwa tarenda ravo.   “Kungowanza madhara ega hakubatsire uye hakuna kwamunosvika nechikwata nekuti madhara anenge achembera. Ndiko kusaka muchiona kuti zvikwata zvinobva muNorthern Region pazvinopinda muPSL zvinosvika zvichitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura nekuti chikwata chinenge chakaumbwa chine vechidiki vakawanda.   “Tinoona kuti madhara mazhinji kana apera anouya kuzopedzera nguva yavo muDivision One voshaisa vechidiki mukana. Asi tinoti ipai mukana kune vechidiki uye madhara musamarase zvachose nekuti vanodiwa kudzikamisa vechidiki nekubatsira kuvaumba,” anodaro Kweza.   Pari zvino pazvikwata zvinokwikwidza muPremier League, zvitatu zvinoti Ngezi Platinum Stars, Harare City neHerentals ndizvo zvine vechidiki vanokwikwidza muNorthern Region Division One.   Zvikwata zvevechidiki izvi zvnoti Ngezi Platinum Under-19, Harare City Curbs neHerentals U-20.   Kuchitiwo Highlanders ndiyo yega ine chikwata chinokwikwidza muSouthern Region Division One.   Kweza anoti kana zvikwata zvakawanda zvemuPSL zvikave nevatambi vanokwikwidza muDivision One zvinobatsirikana kuburikidza nekubika vatambi uye hazvizombonetsekane nekutenga vatambi.   “Zvikwata zvose zvemuPSL zvikaita vechidiki vanokwikwidza muDivision One, zvinobatsira kubika vatambi vakawanda uye hakuna chikwata chinozombonetsekana nekutenga vatambi nekuti vanenge varipo vakawanda.   “Saka kurudziro iri kuzvikwata zvose kuti itaiwo zvikwata zvenyu zvevechidiki zviri muDivision One uye koshesai kubika vatambi vechidiki,” anodaro Kweza.
